title: Caravanserai Desert Dinner With Optional Transfers
description:
Take a step back in time and explore an ancient culture with a modern twist accompanied with dining experience.

What to Expect

The adventure begins when your guide picks you up from your hotel in Dubai to caravanserai desert camp for a buffet style dining experience. Embark on a traditional buffet dinner, followed by authentic Bedouin live performances. Find all you need, to immerse yourself in the ultimate Arabian experience.

Highlights
  • Caravanserai camp: Take a journey with us and step into a world of traditional style with a touch of luxury and authentic camp experience.
  • 5-star Arabian (inspired buffet): Indulge in an array of dishes that represents the finest Arabian cuisine, carefully curated to delight your senses.
  • Live shows: Immerse yourself in the captivating Arabian culture with live performances.
What's Included in the ticket
  • Pick up and drop off service
  • Camel riding
  • Henna painting
  • Belly dance, fire dance and more
  • Fire show
  • Air-conditioned 4x4 vehicle
  • Live Barbecue
  • International 5-star buffet
  • Water and soft drinks
What's not Included in the ticket
  • Anything not mentioned in Inculsions
  • Dune bashing
Timing's
  • Tour timing's: 06:00 p.m. to 09:00 p.m.
  • Tour Operates on daily basis
  • Pick up will be in between 05:00 p.m. to 05:30 p.m.
Commence your journey as your guide collects you from your Dubai hotel, heading to the Caravanserai Desert Camp by Tour Dubai for a buffet-style dining escapade. Indulge in a traditional buffet dinner and relish authentic Bedouin live performances. Everything you require for the quintessential Arabian experience awaits at the Caravanserai Luxury Camp in Dubai.

title: Discover Scuba Dive at Fujairah
description:
Discover the marine world under the sea and learn the basics of scuba diving at Fujairah.


What To Expect

 Explore the colorful corals and tropical marine life of Fujairah and learn how to dive with the help of certified instructors in this beginner-level scuba diving lesson. 



  Highlights

- A perfect opportunity to try scuba diving and explore the underwater world with no prior experience required.
- Explore the Fujairah coast and try scuba diving with no commitment to a longer program.
- Learn the basics of scuba diving with the help of certified diving instructors.
- Discover the Arabian waters with one of the best scuba diving Fujairah experiences. 



What’s included in the ticket

 - One 2-3 Hour Scuba Diving Session with Certified Instructors.
- Scuba Diving Suit and Equipment.
- Unlimited Soft Drinks and Water.



Timing: 

 8:30 a.m, 1:30 p.m.  



Ticket Information: 


- Discover Scuba Dive at Fujairah ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable.
- Visitors are not allowed to bring food or beverages, glassware, or alcohol into the premises.
- Please carry a valid photo ID with you.
- Book online in advance to redeem the best deals and offers.


Important things to know before your visit

 - Discover Scuba Dive at the Fujairah Dress Code: Comfortable swimming attire and footwear are required.
- Discover Scuba Dive at Fujairah

Age and Health Restrictions:
- Participants must be 10 years or older.
- Participants must be fit to dive.
- Participants must pass a dive medical questionnaire.
- Please bring a towel and a change of clothes.
- Transportation pick up and drop off from Dubai to Fujairah is available
- Transportation costs may vary on the time trip.


Address: Nemo Diving Center Dubai, Fujairah, UAE

How to get there:


 By car: Nemo Diving Center is located in Fujairah, which is easily accessible by car. You can park the car in the designated parking for a small fee.  

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to the location from anywhere in Dubai. It’s a popular destination, and most taxi drivers will be familiar with the location. Explore the colorful corals and tropical marine life of Fujairah and learn how to dive with the help of certified instructors in this beginner-level scuba diving lesson.

title: Gravity Indoor Skydiving
description:
Immerse yourself in the exhilarating world of indoor skydiving at "Gravity Indoor Skydiving," located in the heart of Manama. This state-of-the-art attraction offers a thrilling experience where you can feel the sensation of freefalling and learn the art of human body flight in one of the world's largest indoor wind tunnels. With expert instructors, top-of-the-line equipment, and a focus on safety, "Gravity Indoor Skydiving" provides a unique and unforgettable adventure for individuals of all skill levels.

Highlights
  • Feel the rush of wind as you float effortlessly in the massive indoor wind tunnel, replicating the sensation of a real skydive without the need for an airplane.
  • Receive guidance from experienced instructors who will teach you the techniques of body flight. Learn how to maneuver your body, maintain stability, and perform exhilarating tricks as you soar through the air.
  • Capture your moments of soaring through the air on camera to share with friends and family
What’s included in the ticket
Access to Gravity Indoor Skydiving.    

Timing: 
  • From Tuesday to Saturday from Tuesday to Saturday from 1:00 p.m. to 09:00 p.m.
  • Closed on Sunday and Monday
  • Please be present at Gravity Indoor Skydiving 1 hour before their flight time.
Ticket Information:

  • Gravity Indoor Skydiving ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable. 
Important things to know before your visit
 Gravity Indoor Skydiving Dress Code: Upon arrival, customers are kindly requested to wear sneakers and socks.

Age and Health Restrictions:
  • Participants must not have a history of neck, back or heart problems and is not claustrophobic.
  • Participants must not be intoxicated or has taken any medication which is likely to interfere with the ability to flight.
  • The maximum weight limit is 135 kg. 
  • It is recommended that participants be at least 4 years old and weigh at least 15 kg. For individuals under 4 years old or lighter than 15 kg, the parent or guardian assumes full responsibility.
How to get there:
By car: Take Sheikh Khalifa Bin Salman Highway (Highway 55) towards Manama and follow signs to the venue. Plan your journey in advance and allow for potential traffic delays.  

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to Gravity Indoor Skydiving from anywhere in Manama. It's a famous destination and most drivers will be familiar with the location. Indoor Skydiving: Gravity Indoor Skydiving, Manama Get ready to enter the action-packed world of Indoor Skydiving at Gravity Indoor Skydiving, right in the heart of Bahrain.    

Indoor Skydiving is a one-of-a-kind venue that will surely provide you with an amazing indoor skydiving experience. 

There, you'll get to feel the sensation of freefalling through one of the world's largest wind tunnels. You don't have to worry about having experience as it caters to all skill levels, so whether you're a beginner or an experienced flyer, this is one of, if not the best indoor skydiving facility where the daredevil inside you can be let loose.    

With expert instructors and world-class equipment, gravity Indoor Skydiving ensures safety first while still providing the ultimate adventure for all experience levels. This is the perfect opportunity to test your limits and learn the art of human body flight in a safe and controlled environment.

title: Luxury Speed Boat Tour by The Black Boats
description: .	Join The Black Boats for an unforgettable speed boat tour experience in Dubai. Choose from the Dubai Atlantis Boat Tour, a leisurely cruise along the Marina Canal with stunning views of JBR and Atlantis the Palm, or the longer Burj Al Arab Boat Tour, a 100-minute journey taking in breathtaking views of Dubai's shoreline, including the iconic Burj Al Arab and Atlantis Hotel. Both tours offer plenty of opportunities to capture unforgettable memories of Dubai's most iconic landmarks.

title: Lunch at Mundo
description:
Indulge your senses with a culinary journey at Mundo Restaurant A la carte lunch, where you will find an extensive array of international cuisines to satisfy every craving. Enjoy a variety of flavors from aromatic curries and spicy stir-fries to the freshness of crisp salads and succulent roasts. The restaurant also has a fantastic location at Jumeirah Emirates Tower, being in the heart of Dubai's financial district makes it easily accessible for everyone.

Highlights
  • The lunch A la carte at Mundo Restaurant provides an unforgettable dining experience that will leave you feeling completely satisfied. 
  • Indulge in our delicious pasta station where you can create your own pasta bowl with a choice of noodles and sauces to satisfy your taste buds.
  • Experience a new taste of sushi as our expert sushi chefs use only the freshest ingredients to create a wide selection of classic and innovative sushi rolls. 

What’s included in the ticket
  •  A la carte Lunch and Water
Not Included: 
  • Soft drinks
  • Alcoholic drinks

Important Update:

Please note that Mundo restaurant at Jumeirah Emirates Towers will be serving the a la carte menu for lunch instead of a Buffet, until the 15th of September 2024.   Guests will continue to be able to order 1 starter, 1 main course, and a dessert from the a la carte menu, at the same rate as the buffet.

Available throughout weekends and weekdays from 01:00 p.m. to 03:00 p.m.

title: Dubai Private City Tour with Transfers
description:
Come and join our tour and you will discover more of the hidden secrets of this town with our friendly English Speaking Tour Guide. We will take you through the heart of Dubai and explore a fascinating morning tour. The most modern and most desired tourist destination, which has lot to surprise any tourist who arrives in Dubai. We will have a start with a Visit to Gold Souk and Spice Souk. From there, you will have a chance to buy a souvenirs from your Love ones. there will be a drive through "Dubai Frame" which is the World's largest frame and then drive towards the Burj Khalifa in Sheikh Zayed Road and proceed to Palm Island and have a photo stop at "The Pointe" where you will have the stunning view of Atlantis The Palm, we will also visit Madinat Souk where you will see the fascinating "Burj Al Arab‚Äùand drive back to hotel.

Highlights
  •  Visit to Gold Souk n Spice Souk by Abra
  •  Visit to Marjan Gallery Drive through Sheikh Zayed Road 
  •  Photostop at Madinat Jumeirah Souk for Burj Al Arab
  •  photo Photostop at the Pointe

Inclusions:  
  • Pick up and drop off with private transfer 
  • 4 hours tour with English speaking chauffeur for half day
  • 8 hours  tour with English speaking chauffeur if you select the full day
  Exclusions:
  • Ticket entry to any attraction
  • Food and drinks
  • Any souvenirs 


Timing: 
Full-day Tour: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. (8 hours)
Half-day Tour: 9 a.m. to 1 p.m. (4 hours)  

Ticket Information:  
  • Children under 3 years can join the tour for free.
  • Dubai City Tour ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable.
  • Visitors are not allowed to bring glassware or alcohol into the premises.
  Important things to know before your visit
  • Dubai City Tour Dress Code: Smart casual clothing is allowed during the tour.
  • Dubai City Tour Age and Health Restrictions: The Dubai City Tour is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers.
  • Please inform the staff while booking the tour whether you need child seats.
How to get there:
For this tour, guests will be provided pick-up and drop-off from their location. Join our tour to uncover the hidden secrets of Dubai with our amiable English-speaking tour guide. Explore the heart of the city during a captivating morning tour, delving into the surprises that Dubai, the most modern and sought-after tourist destination, has to offer.  

Begin with a visit to the Gold Souk and Spice Souk, providing an opportunity to purchase souvenirs for your loved ones. Enjoy a drive through the iconic 'Dubai Frame,' the world's largest frame, followed by a journey along Sheikh Zayed Road towards Burj Khalifa. Continue to Palm Island, with a photo stop at 'The Pointe,' offering a stunning view of Atlantis The Palm. Explore Madinat Souk to witness the captivating Burj Al Arab before concluding the tour with a return to the hotel.

title: Abu Dhabi Private City Tour from Dubai with Transfers
description:
Visit the Capital of UAE - Abu Dhabi. The architectural brilliance or modern enforcements in terms of infrastructure. The city corniche - well-maintained waterfront which gives stunning views of the city & beautiful buildings within such as Etihad Towers, Emirates Palace hotel, Sheikh Zayed Mosque, Louvre Museum & more. Not only this, it is home to amusement parks such as Yas marina, Ferrari world, Warner bros & more. Our first stop is at the breath-taking Sheikh Zayed Mosque for a photo stop. We then driver through Emirates Palace (The guests who has reservations can enter the Palace). Our route takes us along a scenic drive along the Riviera styled Abu Dhabi Corniche past the intriguing sights of the capital known for its sky scrapers, palaces and villas before heading to Marjan gallery to see different kinds of souvenirs and traditional carpets, dress etc. We then head to visit the Dates market. Our tour ends with a drive through Louvre Museum & photo stop at Ferrari park before heading back to Dubai.

Highlights

  • Drive Through Emirates Palace
  • Photostop to Corniche
  • Visit Marjan
  • Visit Dates Market
  • Drive through Louvre Museum

Exclusions:
  • Ticket entry to any attraction

  • Age and Health Restrictions: The tour is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers.

Not only this, it is home to amusement parks such as Yas marina, Ferrari world, Warner bros & more.  

Our first stop is at the breath-taking Sheikh Zayed Mosque for a photo stop. We then driver through Emirates Palace (The guests who has reservations can enter the Palace). Our route takes us along a scenic drive along the Riviera styled Abu Dhabi Corniche past the intriguing sights of the capital known for its sky scrapers, palaces and villas before heading to Marjan gallery to see different kinds of souvenirs and traditional carpets, dress etc. We then head to visit the Dates market. title: Morning Desert Safari Dubai with Dune Bashing, Sand Boarding & Camel Ride
description:
Experience an exhilarating morning desert safari in Dubai, starting with a hotel pick-up in a 4x4 Land Cruiser, followed by a thrilling 35-45 minutes of dune bashing across the Lahbab Red Dunes. Take in the breathtaking desert scenery and feel the adrenaline rush as the Land Cruiser navigates the sandy terrain. Capture unforgettable moments with sandboarding, a popular desert activity, and enjoy optional quad biking. Afterwards, immerse yourself in Arabian hospitality at the Al Khayma camp, where you'll be treated to traditional Arabic coffee, sweets, and dates. Relax and embark on a short camel ride in the nearby area before concluding your adventure and being transported back to your hotel. Discover the best of Dubai's desert landscape with this unforgettable morning safari.

Highlights
  • Enjoy a morning safari in the Dubai Desert
  • Experience the excitement of a dune-bashing adventure in a 4x4 Land Cruiser
  • Try sandboarding, fast becoming one of the most popular desert activities and drive the optional off-road quad bike
  • Immerse yourself in the charm of the Al Khayma traditional camp and embark on an unforgettable camel ride experience.
  What’s included in the ticket
  • Clean, air-conditioned 4x4 Land Cruiser
  • Pickup and drop-off in Dubai
  • Dune bashing (30-45 minutes)
  • Sandboarding and photos stop
  • A professional licensed safari guide
  • A short camel ride (which can be repeated)
  • Cold mineral water
Not included: 
  • Quad bike (optional)
Timing: 

Pickup time - Summer: 7:00 AM | Winter: 7:45AM 
The tour ends at 12:00 p.m.   

Ticket Information: 
  • Morning Desert Safari Dubai Ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable. 
Important things to know before your visit
Age and Health Restrictions: 
  • Infants (under the age of 3) are not allowed in the car during the dune-bashing drive
  • This activity is not allowed for pregnant women or those who have back, neck, or heart problems
  • It is recommended that you do not to eat 2 to 3 hours before the safari trip to avoid sickness during the dune bashing
  • Self-practicing quad biking is solely your responsibility. It is strongly recommended that you listen to and follow the tour leader. Please note that any damage, injuries sustained or items lost during quad biking are not covered by insurance
How to get there:
Complimentary pickup is available from Dubai city hotels, apartments, and Cruise terminal Dubai ( Port Rashid).

Pickup from Bab Al Shams, Al Maha Resort, and Jebel Ali is available with an additional fee. On shared tours the actual pick-up time will be within 45 minutes of your selected pickup time, Please be ready at the hotel lobby on time. Experience an exhilarating morning desert safari in Dubai, starting with a hotel pick-up in a 4x4 Land Cruiser, followed by a thrilling 30-45 minutes of dune bashing across the Lahbab Red Dunes.

Take in the breathtaking desert scenery and feel the adrenaline rush as the Land Cruiser navigates the sandy terrain. Capture unforgettable moments with sandboarding, a popular desert activity, and enjoy optional quad biking.

Afterwards, immerse yourself in Arabian hospitality at the Al Khayma camp, where you'll be treated to traditional Arabic coffee, sweets, and dates. Relax and embark on a short camel ride in the nearby area chance to interact with falcons before concluding your adventure and being transported back to your hotel.

Discover the best of Dubai's desert landscape with this unforgettable morning safari.

title: Monster Bus Desert Adventure Tour
description:
Embark on an unforgettable sightseeing bus tour, traversing the majestic dunes and immersing yourself in unparalleled desert hospitality. This is a once-in-a-lifetime experience that you'll never want to let slip away as we transport you deep into the heart of the desert on our massive 32-seater off-road monster bus.

Highlights
  • Experience a tranquil drive from Doha to the enchanting Sealine desert.
  • Embrace thrilling excitement amidst breathtaking dunes.
  • Witness the wonder where the sea meets the desert in the Inland sea, Khor Al Adaid."
What’s included in the ticket
  •  Pick up and drop off from your location within Doha city limits
  • Off-road desert drive through the sand dunes on the Monster Bus with our experienced driver
  • Fun photo opportunities in the desert"

Not included: 
  • Any applicable additional charges such as meals, gratuities, etc.
Timing: 
  • Daily except Mondays from 09:00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m and 02:00 p.m. - 04:00 p.m 
  • We recommend afternoon tours during the summer season.    
  Ticket Information:

  • Below 3 years old – are eligible for FREE entry 
  • Between 3 years to 11 years – must purchase a child ticket. 
  • Please note that the tour is self-guided and is shared with other participants.
  Important things to know before your visit
  • Doha Bus Tour Dress Code: Comfortable and modest clothing especially during summer. Bring your Sunblock and Sunglasses. 
  • Tours are non guided
Cancellation Policy:

  • You can cancel your booking 48 hours prior and receive a full refund.
Embark on an unforgettable sightseeing bus tour, traversing the majestic dunes and immersing yourself in unparalleled desert hospitality.

This is a once-in-a-lifetime experience that you'll never want to let slip away as we transport you deep into the heart of the desert on our massive 32-seater off-road monster bus.

title: Rising Sun Hot Air Balloon Ride in Ras Al Khaimah
description:
One of the best things to do in Ras Al Khaimah is watching the sun rise and illuminate the spectacular Ras al Khaimah desert from a hot air balloon.

You’ll love the dramatic and spectacular colours of the Northern Emirates, the dunes are contoured as if sculpted by giants from rich reddish gold.   Soar with eagles to a height you may observe wildlife in their natural habitat. You may see foxes, oryx, camels, herds of wild donkeys, and more.  

Each day offers different views, as we launch from various locations depending on the wind conditions on the day. We may fly past mangroves, the desert and wadis towards the majestic Hajar Mountains, or out towards the coast and back where we will see Marjan Island and the Arabian sea.

Spectacular scenery can be assured from each location.   We offer flights for individuals, small personal occasions, large groups of 20 persons per basket. Group rates apply Contact us to arrange private group flights ActionFlight hot air Balloon flights are a premium quality adventure.


Your enjoyment of every aspect of our operation, from safety standards, food and beverage, customer service and attention to detail is our priority.


What is Included:  

  • Soar high above the Ras al Khaimah desert in a hot air balloon and immerse yourself in a breathtaking panoramic view that showcases the mesmerizing expanse of golden dunes stretching as far as the eye can see.
  • Indulge in a captivating hot air balloon ride in Ras al Khaimah that combines the thrill of soaring through the sky with the serene tranquility of floating gently above the desert
  • Experience the thrill of spotting elusive desert wildlife from a unique vantage point as you glide silently through the air.


  Important Information:    

•  Age Restrictions : Only allowed for children above 5 years. We reserve the right to ask for children to be restrained, or to refuse to fly them if safety is a concern.
   Children and teenagers under the age of 16 must always be accompanied by an adult or person 16 years or over, who is responsible for them during the flight.
   Ballooning is also not an activity suitable for babies due to safety reasons.
•  The maximum permissible weight is 130 kg.  
• DSLR or Camera is not allowed. You can use your mobile phones to capture photos (on flight/airplane mode)
• Ballooning is a weather dependant activity. We won’t fly in rain, fog, or wind consistently above 11 kph. We won’t take a balloon up if there is a threat of thunderstorms in the area.
• If your flight is cancelled, you can re book at a convenient time, within the valid period of your booking or voucher. 



  How to get there:

•  Return transport is available at the rate of 100 AED per passenger originating from Dubai, Fujairah, Sharjah, Ajman or Umm Al Quwain to Ras Al Khaimah
•  Passengers from Dubai and beyond are welcome to drive and park in Ras Al Khaimah. Transport within Ras Al Khaimah is free. 
•  Pick up time and place is arranged upon booking.

Witness the mesmerizing sunrise and be enchanted by the breathtaking Ras al Khaimah desert from a hot air balloon, offering a unique and exhilarating experience in one of the most captivating destinations. Enjoy the vibrant colors and contours of the dunes, encounter wildlife in their natural habitat, and soak in the stunning views of mangroves, mountains, and coastal beauty. ActionFlight ensures a premium adventure with a strong emphasis on safety, exceptional service, and meticulous attention to detail, making it an unforgettable journey for both individuals and groups.

title: Dubai Marina Sunset Cruise with Live Music & Open Bar
description:
Elevate your evening to new heights with Dubai's exclusive 4-star luxury boat cruise, providing a truly remarkable experience. Step aboard our magnificent 125ft glass houseboat and embark on a journey of indulgence. Our exceptional service ensures an unforgettable dinner cruise, where you can relish the opulence of your private seating while savoring the exquisite flavors of our sumptuous international buffet menu, crafted by The Radisson Blu Hotel. Prepare for a night of pure luxury and create treasured memories on this extraordinary cruise.

Highlights
  • Enjoy magnificent views of the city including Dubai Marina, Ain Wheel, JBR & Harbour in the luxury sunset cruise.
  • Delight in a delectable spread of international buffets and live cooking stations.
  • Unwind and be serenaded by the enchanting melodies of romantic music.
  • Immerse yourself in the enchantment of live music and be welcomed with a red carpet-entry for a truly memorable experience.
What’s included in the ticket
  • 90 min ride on the Luxury Sunset Cruise
  • Welcome drinks and refreshments
  • International buffet including BBQ, Canapés, Asian & Western, Salads & Desserts.
  • Unlimited Tea, coffee, and soft beverages.
  • Enjoying unbelievable views of Dubai (Dubai Marina, Ain Wheel, JBR & Harbour). The route may change depending on weather conditions.
  • Photo Moments
Timing: 
Monday to Sunday
  • Boarding starts at 04:30 p.m.
  • Departure Time - 05:00 p.m Sharp
  • Arrival Time: 06:30 p.m.
  Ticket Information:
  • Boarding will start 30 minutes prior to the departure
  • Please bring your booking confirmation either on your phone or a printout
Important things to know before your visit
  • Sunset Cruise In Dubai Marina Dress Code: Smart casual clothing is allowed during the tour. No beachwear allowed.
  • Dancing is not allowed on the cruise

title: 90 Mins Guided Sightseeing Boat Tour
description:
Join us for an exhilarating 90-minute guided Speed Boat Tour by Xclusive Yachts, the most popular sightseeing boat tour in Dubai. title: Thrilling Off-Road Adventure: Quad Bike
description:
Embark on the ultimate adventure with our Quad Bike tours in Dubai‚Äîan exhilarating blend of adrenaline, stunning landscapes, and cultural immersion. Explore the captivating Arabian desert like never before as you ride through the dunes. Choose from our flexible durations of 30, 60, or 120 minutes, allowing you to tailor the experience to your preferences. Whether you prefer the inside area camp or the vastness of the outside open desert, the thrill is guaranteed. Unleash your inner thrill-seeker, embrace the extraordinary, and make memories that last a lifetime with our Quad Bike tours in Dubai!



Highlights

  • Diverse Quad Adventures: Embark on a thrilling quad bike adventure in Dubai, where you can choose between navigating challenging terrains in the open desert or enjoying the excitement within our dedicated camp area.
  • Scenic Variety: Explore the breathtaking landscapes of Dubai, whether it's the vast golden sand dunes stretching across the open desert or the curated surroundings of our camp area. Each location offers unique and stunning views.
  • Dual Experiences: Opt for the exhilarating open desert experience, conquering steep dunes, or enjoy the convenience and structured fun of quad biking within our camp area. The choice is yours for a tailored adventure.
  • Expert Guidance in Two Settings: Our experienced guides are there to ensure your safety and provide insights into the desert ecosystem, history, and culture, enriching your experience whether you're in the open desert or within the camp area.
  • Inclusive for All: Whether you're a beginner or an experienced off-roader, both the open desert and camp area tours cater to all skill levels. Expert instructors offer orientations, making it an inclusive adventure for everyone.
  • Lasting Memories: Capture unforgettable moments, whether it's the thrill of conquering open desert dunes or the camaraderie within the camp area. Immortalize your adventure with stunning photographs of both unique settings in the Dubai desert.
 

What’s included in the ticket

·         1 or 2-hour tour of the selected activities.

·         Experienced and trained tour guides.

·         Safety and support on all tours.


Not included:

·         Food and drinks

·         Any items bought from the souvenir shop

·         Transport is available at 300 dhs per vehicle per way for up to 5 pax


Timing: 

·         Tours are available every day from 07:00 a.m. to 07:00 p.m. with no specific timeslot, all depends on the guest's request.


Important things to know before your visit

·         Quad Bike Experience in Dubai Dress Code: Prepare for the adventure by wearing fully covered attire, including closed-toe shoes and pants.

·         The trained crew is always there to supervise the whole dune quad tour and will provide first aid in case of an accident. 

·         Age and Health Restrictions: 16+ years old are allowed to drive the Quad Bike

·         Pregnant women, kids, and people with heart problems are not allowed on the tour for their own safety. 

·         Our dune quad rentals are well-maintained and are checked regularly.

·         All customers must arrive 30 minutes prior to booking.

·         Clients are given safety training before starting a tour.

·         Our tour guide is always ready to help you if a vehicle breaks down while dune quad riding.


Address: Al badayer Dubai - Dubai-Hatta Rd - Sharjah  

How to get there:
By car: Participants who choose not to utilize provided transportation, have the option to reach the destination by car, which is conveniently located beside Detour Cafe.ae. The location is situated in Al Badayer Dubai, along the Dubai-Hatta Road in Sharjah.

title: The Lost Paradise of Dilmun Water Park
description:
Looking for a weekend getaway that combines fun, excitement, and adventure? Look no further than the Lost Paradise of Dilmun, the largest water park in Bahrain! With over 20 different slides, rafters, and pools, there's something for everyone at Lost Paradise of Dilmun. Whether you're looking for a relaxing day in the sun or a thrilling adrenaline rush, you're sure to have a blast at this amazing water park.

Games in Lost Paradise of Dilmun:
  • Boomerango: Feel the adrenaline rush as you defy gravity on this giant pendulum-style slide.
  • Body slides: Travel at high speed through three winding flumes in the dark.
  • Family raft ride: Spin and speed down the long, winding chute with your family and friends.
  • The paradise river: Float gently through the caves on the lazy river.
  • Spa pool: Relax your muscles in the therapeutic spa pool or Jacuzzi.
  • Speed slide: Plunge down the vertical sheet of water and experience the thrill of free-falling.
  • Aqua loop rocket slide: Experience the most exciting free-fall drop on the world's fastest looping rocket slide.
  • Oasis pool: Take a break from the action and relax at the Oasis pool.
  • Super Bowl: Twist and shout as you spin around and round the bowl.

Highlights
  • A special weekend getaway filled with fun, excitement, and adventure.
  • Enjoy over 20 thrilling slides, rafters, and pools catering to all ages and preferences.
  • Experience heart-pounding attractions like the Boomerango, Aqua Loop Rocket Slide, and Super Bowl, alongside relaxing options like the lazy river and spa pool.

What’s included in the ticket: 
Access to all the park's activities and rides.     

Timing: 
  • 8th march to 10th march - 10am to 7pm
Ramadan timing
  • Sunday to Thursday - 5pm to 1am
  • Friday / Saturday - 12noon to 1am

Important things to know before your visit
  • The Lost Paradise of Dilmun Water Park Dress Code: Kids must wear personal floatation devices at all times.
  • Guests enter the water park at their own risk.
  • The owners and/or management are not responsible for any lost/stolen property, body injury or accidents.
How to get there:
By car: Take the King Faisal Highway (Highway 5) west of Manama and continue until you reach the exit for Zallaq.
Follow the signs for the water park. The water park will be on your right-hand side."

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to The Lost Paradise of Dilmun Water Park from anywhere in Bahrain. It's a famous destination and most drivers will be familiar with the location. Looking for a weekend getaway that combines fun, excitement, and adventure? Look no further than the Lost Paradise of Dilmun Bahrain, the largest water park in the country!

title: Dubai: Half Day Morning City Tour
description: .	Explore Al Seef, where the charm of Dubai's rich heritage seamlessly blends with contemporary design. title: Premium Red Dunes Safari with Camel Ride & 3 Cuisines at Al Khayma Camp
description:
About Premium Red Dunes Safari & Camel Ride & 3 Cuisines at Al Khayma Camp Dubai: Adventure Quad Bike safari, Camel Ride, Sandboarding and BBQ


Overview

Traverse to the alluring Lahbab Desert and engage in thrilling adventures. Experience the thrill of quad biking, sandboarding and enjoy a peaceful camel ride. Retreat to the Bedouin camp and experience cultural activities and delicious dinner/lunch.

 

Highlights

  • Enjoy an evening at the exclusive Al Khayma Desert Camp, Dubai in the middle of the desert.
  • Bash dunes for 30-45-minutes in the Lehbab desert.
  • 3-Cuisine Traditional Dinner: Relish a 3-cuisine Emirati, Moroccan, & Arabian dinner catered by Al Khayma Heritage Restaurant.
  • Smoke a shisha pipe, henna painting, Arabian makeover with a falcon
  • Ride on a camel caravan.
  • Traverse the tall red dunes of the Lahbab desert by Dune Bashing and Sandboarding.
  • Choose the option to ride qua bikes through the desert.
  • Watch the tanoura and belly dance show (no show during the month of Ramadan).
  • Al Khayma Camp:Spend time in the serene atmosphere of the Al Khayma Camp 
  • Stargazing Session: Treat your eyes to the beauty of the desert sky on a stargazing session with a high-power telescope.


Full Description

Ride to the Desert

Excited about a heart-pounding desert adventure? Level up your fun in Dubai by setting out on an exciting desert safari through the desert's golden sands. Get a comfortable transfer on an Air-conditioned 4WD vehicle.

Dune Bashing and Sandboarding

At the desert, experience the real adventure as you tackle the sloping sands of the desert by dune bashing if the Red Dune Safari is selected. Worry not! You’ll be completely safe while enjoying it, under our guidance. Just after you recover from the excitement of dune bashing, you’ll get a chance to conquer the steepest slopes like a warrior by sandboarding. 

Al Khayma Heritage Camp & Bedouin Entertainment

The fun doesn’t end here. As the sun turns the countryside an amazing shade of crimson orange, Al Khayma Heritage Camp will be all set to welcome you. From there, reward yourself with feeding the camels and riding them to explore nature like a Bedouin local.Then comes your chance to be immersed in the Bedouin entertainment activities! Tick off your entertainment list as you indulge in the camp activities such as Live Arabic Coffee & tea station, Bedouin & Arabian entertainment with a fire show, Henna, Shisha Station, and more. 

Traditional Dinner & Stargazing

 A 3-course dinner with Emirati, Moroccan, & Arabian dishes catered by Al Khayma Restaurant is all that you need to feast your palate. The delicious dinner, catered by the Michelin BiB-rated restaurant, is sure to remind you of the good times in the camp later. 

Once your heart and tummy are full, observe the millions of stars with an enchanting stargazing session with a high-power telescope to enlighten your evening before wrapping up the day.

After all the adventurous activities and a wholesome meal, you will be dropped back to your hotel or selected location in Dubai.

 

Includes

  • Pick-up and drop off at your selected hotel/ location
  • Transportation by 4WD air-conditioned vehicle
  • Licensed desert safari guide
  • Dune bashing (30-40 minutes)
  • Sandboarding, Camel ride & Camel feeding
  • Al Khayma Premium Camp visit
  • Gaymat (sweets), Gahwa (coffee), and dates
  • Henna Tatoo, Falcon experience & Shisha in the Shisha Area
  • Unlimited Water & Soft drinks
  • Sunset photo stop
  • Arabian entertainment " Tanura, Fire shows & Khaliji Dance "
  • Stunning sunset views
  • Live BBQ
  • Open buffets Dinner "Emirati, Moroccan & Arabian Buffet “ vegetarian & non-vegetarian options” catered by Al Khayma Heritage Restaurant.
  • Stargazing session;High-power telescope
  • Natural trees and fountains

 

What’s Not Included

  • Alcoholic beverages
  • Quad bike/Dune buggy activities (optional)
  • Tipping (not mandatory)
  • Any extra services or expenses not mentioned above.

 

Important Note:

  • There will be no khaliji dance shows during Ramadan
  • The tour is shared which means sharing a vehicle with other participants.
  • The tour is not allowed for pregnant ladies, people with heart and back issues and kids younger than 3 years old. 

 

Know Before You Go

  • The duration of this activity is approximately 6 hours.
  • To take part in quad biking, the participants must be 16 years or above and should have a basic driving knowledge. Anyone under 16 years should be accompanied by an adult.
  • Children under the age of 10 are not allowed to participate in this tour.
  • Pregnant women and anyone with back or neck pain, heart problems or other serious medical complaints are not allowed to participate.
  • The quad biking segment is solely the participant's responsibility. Listening to and following the instructor is strongly recommended. Any damage, injuries sustained or items lost during the quad bike tour shall not be covered by insurance.
  • Please wear sports shoes for safe sandboarding
  • Please note that if your skin is sensitive to henna, it is advised not to do it.
  • During the month of holy Ramadan, Belly Dance Khaliji will not be performed at the camp as per UAE law. On other Islamic holidays (announced by the govt prior to the specific event/day) there will not be any entertainment activities in the camp as it is strictly not permitted by UAE law
  • All participants must sign an indemnity form before the tour.
  • It is not recommended to carry expensive items. Your belongings are your own responsibility and we are not responsible for any lost belongings during the trip. We will, of course, do our best to help you out if an item is lost.
  • This tour is not wheelchair accessible.
  • We don't accepts no responsibility for any damage, loss, accident, sickness, injury or death that you or anyone else may suffer or incur arising out of the activities and/or in connection with your contract with us and/or the operator of any activities. You are advised to have comprehensive travel and health insurance. All personal effects are at your sole risk at all times during the activity. You understand and accept the potential risks and hazards that can be involved in certain activities. You take responsibility for ensuring that you are mentally and physically capable of participating in a particular activity.


Pickup Location

 Complimentary pick up may be done from any Dubai hotels and other accommodations as well as Cruise terminal Dubai (Port Rashid).
Pick up from Dubai airport is possible from Holiday Inn Airport hotel.
You also may have a pick up from Bab Al Shams, Al Maha resort, and Jebel Ali at extra charge.
Due to heavy traffic in the Rove Marina and Wyndham Dubai Marina areas, Stella Di Mare Hotel will be the meeting point.
Pick up may be done within 45 minutes of appointed departure time.
Please be in a hotel lobby on time.
Please leave us your Whatsapp number for smooth communication during the pick up.


Tickets 
Premium Evening Red Dunes Desert Safari with BBQ at Al Khayma Camp ticket price includes all entertainments mentioned above, a shared transfer, and a BBQ. Tickets for kids from 3 to 11 years come with a discount. Traverse to the alluring Lahbab Desert and engage in thrilling adventures. Experience the thrill of quad biking, sandboarding, and enjoy a peaceful camel ride. Retreat to the Bedouin camp and experience cultural activities and a delicious lunch/dinner. Enjoy an evening at the exclusive Al Khayma Desert Camp, Dubai, in the heart of the desert.  

Go dune bashing for 30-45 minutes in the Lehbab desert and indulge in a 3-Cuisine Traditional Dinner, relishing Emirati, Moroccan, and Arabian delicacies catered by Al Khayma Heritage Restaurant. Smoke a shisha pipe, enjoy henna painting, and experience an Arabian makeover with a falcon. Ride on a camel caravan and traverse the tall red dunes of the Lahbab desert by dune bashing and sandboarding. You can also choose the option to ride quad bikes through the desert.  

Watch the captivating tanoura and belly dance shows (note: no show during the month of Ramadan). Spend time in the serene atmosphere of the Al Khayma Camp, and treat your eyes to the beauty of the desert sky during a stargazing session with a high-power telescope.  

This is an adventure like no other—full of excitement, culture, and beauty!

title: History & Heritage Tour of Qatar
description:
Get the chance to explore Qatar's heritage by heading north to visit historical sites like Al Zubarah Fort and Al Ruwais. The tour also passes by Al Khor, known for its harbor and beaches. Highlights include Al Zubarah Fort's sand-colored architecture, the remains of Al Jumail Abandoned Village, and learning about Al Khor's fishing-based history. This tour offers a glimpse into Qatar's past and its early sources of income. Key Sights Al Zubarah Fort, Al Jumail Abandoned Village, and the town of Al Khor.

Highlights
  • Al Zubarah Fort: A solitary, sand-colored stronghold with four towers, standing guard in the desert.
  • Al Jumail Abandoned Village: Encounter remnants of an ancient traditional settlement along the way.
  • Al Khor's Historical Mainstay: Discover Qatar's early economy in Al Khor, rooted in fishing traditions. 
What’s included in the ticket
  • Pick up and drop off from your location within Doha city limits
  • Transportation in an air-conditioned vehicle with an English-speaking driver
  • Packed snacks
  • Bottled water on board vehicle
  • Visit places such as Al Zubarah Fort, Al Jubail Abandoned Village and the town of Al Khor
Not included
  • Any applicable additional charges such as meals, gratuities, etc.
  • Tour guide
Timing: 
  • Saturday to Thursday from 09:00 a.m. to 02:00 p.m.
  • The tour is not available on Friday
  Ticket Information:
  • Kids below 3 years old are eligible for FREE entry
  • Between 3 years to 11 years - must purchase a child ticket.
Important things to know before your visit
  • History & Heritage Tour of Qatar Dress Code: Comfortable and modest clothing especially during summer months.
  • Bring snacks, sunblock, sunglasses, cap/hat, and wear comfortable modest clothing.

Cancellation Policy:
  • You can cancel your booking up to 48 hours in advance and receive a full refund.

  • 3-hour Camel Trekking experience from Abu Dhabi (Including Travel Time)

title: Muscat Night Tour with Local Dinner
description:
Embark from your hotel for a captivating night tour of Muscat. Departing from Shatti Al-Qurum (next to Intercontinental Hotel), this condensed city tour offers a unique nocturnal perspective. Our journey begins with a glimpse of the Royal Opera, a grand monument commissioned by the music-loving Sultan. Capture the beauty of the illuminated Mohammed Al Ameen Mosque during a photo stop. As we progress, venture to the historic Old Muscat and its picturesque Corniche, taking in the enchanting harbor views. Our next stop is the vibrant Muttrah Souq, where you'll encounter a delightful mix of old and new, immersed in the sights, sounds, and fragrances of daily life. Take a moment for some souvenir shopping. Continue our night expedition with a visit to the prominent Al Alam Palace, capturing the gates and colonnaded approach in the stunning night ambiance. The palace, flanked by the 16th-century Portuguese forts of Jalali and Mirani, serves ceremonial purposes and boasts breathtaking illuminations. Returning to our starting point, pass by the renowned Al Bustan Hotel, Wadi Al Kabir, and Ruwi downtown. Finally, conclude the evening at our last destination, savoring a delightful Omani fish grilled to perfection in the company of locals. After this memorable experience, we'll transfer you back to your hotel.

Highlights
  • Night city tour from Shatti Al-Qurum, with hotel pick-up
  • Pass by Royal Opera, commissioned by the SULTAN
  • Photo stop at illuminated Mohammed Al Ameen Mosque
  • Explore Old Muscat and its Corniche, enjoy harbor views
  • Visit Muttrah Souq for shopping and local experience
  • Drive to Al Alam Palace for illuminated gates and colonial approach
  • Admire nearby Portuguese forts
  • Witness stunning lighting effects
  • Return passing Al Bustan hotel, Wadi Al Kabir, Ruwi downtown
  • Enjoy grilled Omani fish among locals
  • Transfer back to hotel for a memorable Muscat night experience.

title: Full Day Nizwa Tour With Local Lunch
description:
Experience a Full-Day Nizwa Tour with Local Lunch, starting from Shatti Al-Qurum, near the Intercontinental Hotel. Discover Oman's rich heritage of forts and castles, which have served as historical defense points. We'll explore a selection of these architectural marvels, departing at 9 a.m. for Nizwa, Oman's cultural hub. Our journey begins with a visit to the enchanting ancestral village of Birkat Al Mawz nestled at the base of the verdant Jebel Akhdar. Then, we'll head to the heart of Nizwa to glimpse its impressive Fort and iconic circular cannon Tower, strolling through the traditional Nizwa Souq. Enjoy a local restaurant lunch before we continue to the remarkable Jabreen Fort, a 17th-century masterpiece known for its exquisite plasterwork, intricately carved doors, and painted wooden ceiling beams. Following our visit to Jabreen Castle, we'll embark on a scenic drive toward Jebel Shams, one of Oman's renowned mountains. En route, we'll pass through Bahla, one of Oman's oldest small towns, featuring its own fort. Our journey concludes in Nizwa's downtown, and we'll smoothly return to Muscat after an enriching day. The tour concludes at Avenue Mall, and we'll provide a convenient transfer back to your hotel.

Highlights
  • Begin at Shatti Al-Qurum near the Intercontinental Hotel for a cultural tour of Oman's forts and castles.
  • Explore Nizwa, the cultural capital, and its impressive Fort and Cannon Tower.
  • Visit Birkat Al Mawz village at the base of Jebel Akhdar.
  • Discover Jabreen Fort, renowned for its stunning plasterwork and design.
  • Journey to Jebel Shams, a famous Omani mountain, passing Bahla town and its fort.
  • End the day at Muscat's Avenue Mall before returning to your hotel.

title: Half Day Muscat City Tour
description:
Being a rare blend of ancient & modern, Muscat is a beautiful city which lies in a maze of brown pleated Mountains. Lulled by the Arabian Sea, the city has undergone dramatic development in the past two or three decades. However, Muscat takes pride in the fact that it has preserved its lustrous culture & heritage.

What To Expect

Enjoy a Half Day Muscat City Tour, we will pick you up from your hotel. The tour will start from Shatti Al-Qurum (next to Intercontinental Hotel) . 

Our visit starts with a drive through the ministries' area, where you can see a number of modern buildings with touches of ancient, Islamic architecture.

Our first stop will be the Grand Mosque, which is an architectural marvel and perhaps the new landmark of the city.

We will then visit the fish market and the folkloric Muttrah souk, with its narrow-covered alleys where you can smell exotic aromas of mounds of spices, coffee beans, and ancient remedies, all enticing perfumes that fill the air. Next, engage in a visit to the Bait Al Zubair Museum, which has a fine exhibit of Omani history and culture, encompassing all of the area’s traditional values.

You will also have a photo-stop at the magnificent Al Alam Palace (the official residence of Sultan Qaboos) flanked by the twin Portuguese forts of Mirani & Jalali. Tour will end in Mutrah souk & then transfer back to your hotel

Highlights

  • Explore Muscat's captivating blend of ancient and modern, nestled amidst brown mountains and kissed by the Arabian Sea.
  • Begin with a drive through the ministries' area, where modern and Islamic architecture harmoniously coexist.
  • Be awed by the Grand Mosque, a striking modern landmark.
  • Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of the fish market and Muttrah souk, where exotic scents and age-old remedies fill the air.
  • Delve into Omani history and culture at the Bait Al Zubair Museum, a repository of tradition.
  • Capture a memorable photo at Al Alam Palace, the official residence of Sultan Qaboos, flanked by historic Portuguese forts.
  • Conclude your journey in the bustling Mutrah souk before returning to your hotel.
What’s included in the ticket
  • Pick-up and drop-off at appointed hotels or locations on sharing basis.
  • Professional and experienced tour guides.
  • Entrance fees to Bait Al Zubair.
  • Photostop at Al Alam Palace.
  • Visit to Grand Mosque.
What’s not included in the ticket
  • Any other expenses not mentioned in Incusions
Timing: 
  • The duration of the tour is 4 to 5 hours, depending on traffic conditions 
  • The tour operates daily, except on Fridays.
Important things to know before your visit

- Dress code: Appropriate clothing is required for the tour.
- Age and Health Restrictions:
- Half Day Muscat City TourVisit is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers. Join us for an unforgettable Muscat Half Day Tour, starting with a convenient pick-up from your hotel. The journey begins at Shatti Al-Qurum, near the Intercontinental Hotel, where we'll drive through the ministries' area. Here, you can admire modern buildings adorned with ancient Islamic architectural touches.   Our first stop is the Grand Mosque, an architectural marvel and a new city landmark. Next, we'll visit the bustling fish market and the folkloric Muttrah Souk. Wander through its narrow, covered alleys and inhale the exotic aromas of spices, coffee beans, and ancient remedies that fill the air.  

Our tour continues with a visit to the Bait Al Zubair Museum, showcasing a rich exhibit of Omani history and culture, reflecting the area’s traditional values. We'll also make a photo stop at the magnificent Al Alam Palace, the official residence of Sultan Qaboos, flanked by the historic Portuguese forts of Mirani and Jalali.   The half-day Muscat City Tour concludes in Muttrah Souk, where you'll have time to explore before we transfer you back to your hotel. Join us for a journey through time in the beautiful city of Muscat, where every corner tells a story.

title: Beyond the Fort & Northern Oman
description:
Discover the rich history, natural beauty, and vibrant culture of Nakhl on this engaging tour.

What To Expect

 Enjoy The North & Nakhl Half Day Tour, we will pick you up from your hotel.

The tour will start from Shatti Al-Qurum (next to Intercontinental Hotel), Nakhl is a typical Omani village. It lies at the foothills of themountains near an abundant source of water, which irrigates extensive date palm plantations. Nakhl Tour start by driving towards Nakhl Fort. As you approach Nakhl, keep an eye out on the fortress that sits on a hillock outside the town. The fort’s origin is pre-Islamic with major contributions by the Al Ya’ruba and the Al Bu Sayed dynasties. We will visit the fort from outside, (Fort is closed for renovation) and the mineral-laden hot springs water in Nakhl (Al Thowarah Hot Spring). Then we stop in Seeb souq by the seaside for a photostop. Tour will end in Avenue mall & then transfer back to your hotel.  

Highlights
  • Shatti Al-Qurum: The tour kicks off from the picturesque Shatti Al-Qurum area.
  • Nakhl Village: Explore Nakhl, a charming Omani village nestled at the base of the mountains.
  • Nakhl Fort: Marvel at the historic Nakhl Fort, situated on a hillock outside the town. 
  • Al Thowarah Hot Spring: Experience the rejuvenating mineral-laden hot springs of Nakhl, known as Al Thowarah Hot Spring, offering a unique natural bath.
  • Seeb Souq: Capture stunning photos at Seeb Souq, located by the seaside, and soak in the coastal beauty.
  • Avenue Mall: Conclude your tour with a visit to Avenue Mall, where you can shop and explore.

What’s included in the ticket
  • Pick-up and drop-off at appointed hotels or locations on sharing basis.
  • Professional and experienced tour guides.
  • Entrance fees to Nakhl Fort.
  • Photostop at Seeb souq.
What’s not included in the ticket
  • Any other expenses not mentioned in Incusions
Key Sight: Nakhl Fort, Al Thowarah Hot Spring,Seeb Souq & Avenue Mall

Timing 
  • The duration of the tour is 4 to 5 hours, depending on traffic conditions 
  • The tour operates on daily basis.
Important things to know before your visit

- Dress code: Appropriate clothing is required for the tour.
- Age and Health Restrictions:
- The North & Nakhl Half Day Tour, Visit is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers. Nakhl, a quintessential Omani village, is nestled at the foothills of mountains and nourished by abundant water sources that irrigate vast date palm plantations.

Our Nakhl Tour starts with a scenic drive towards Nakhl Fort. As you approach the village, you'll spot the impressive Fort Nakhl Oman, perched on a hillock outside the town. The fort dates back to pre-Islamic times, with significant contributions from the Al Ya’ruba and Al Bu Sayed dynasties. Although the fort is currently closed for renovation, you can still admire its majestic exterior and learn about its rich history.  

Next, we will visit the mineral-laden Al Thowarah Hot Spring in Nakhl, known for its rejuvenating waters. After soaking in the serene ambiance of the hot springs, we'll head to Seeb Souq by the seaside for a picturesque photo stop.  

Our tour concludes at Avenue Mall, where you can enjoy some free time before we transfer you back to your hotel. Join us for an unforgettable journey through Nakhl, where history, culture, and natural beauty intertwine.

title: South & Wadi Shab With Lunch
description:
Experience a day trip to Wadi Shab in Oman, departing from Shatti Al-Qurum near the Intercontinental Hotel. Your adventure begins with a 1.5-hour drive through scenic mountains and desert landscapes, passing the coastal town of Quriyat before arriving at Wadi Shab. A 45-minute guided hike takes you to natural pools and a captivating cave. Spend three hours swimming in the crystal-clear waters before enjoying lunch at Wadi Shab Resort. Afterward, continue your journey, stopping at Finn's village for photos and reaching the stunning Bimah Sinkhole for another swimming opportunity. Finally, return to Muscat, concluding your nature-filled day in Shatti Al Qurum and transferring you back to your hotel. Key Sight: Shatti Al-Qurum, Quriyat, Wadi Shab, Wadi Shab Resort, Village of Finns & Bimah Sinkhole.

Highlights
  • Scenic Start: Depart from Shatti Al-Qurum near Intercontinental Hotel.
  • Diverse Landscapes: Traverse mountains, deserts, and charming coastal Quriyat.
  • Wadi Shab Adventure: After a 1.5-hour drive, embark on a guided 45-minute hike to natural pools and caves.
  • Take a refreshing swim in clear waters, followed by a relaxed 45-minute return walk. Then enjoy a 3 hours in Wadi Shab and savor a meal with a view. 
  • Coastal Drive: Explore Finn's village and pristine white sand beaches.
  • Bimah Sinkhole: Swim in the half-salted waters of this natural wonder.
  • Relaxing Return: Journey back to Muscat with a smooth drive.

title: Al Montazah Parks - Pearls Kingdom Water Park
description:
This aquatic wonderland is rated 7th best water park in the world by TripAdvisor, and offer a host of exhilarating water slides, tube rides, speed slides and an aptly named lazy river to thrill all members of the family.

Are you ready to be transported into an exciting wonderland with raging pirates, sunken treasures, magic carpets, massive palaces, hidden galaxies and more? Well, then these and a whole lot more are part of what await you at Pearls Kingdom. Come on over with your friends and family, and experience a magical day of nonstop excitement.   This state of the art water park, built with a cost of over AED 100 million is rated as the 7th best water park in the world by TripAdvisor, and offer a host of over 30 aquatic rides and slides to thrill all members of the family.    Sharjah city is known for its historical brilliance, architectural buildings and culture. The Al Montazah water park - Pearls Kingdom enjoys a convenient downtown location and is only under 20 minutes drive from both Dubai and Sharjah Airports respectively.

Highlights
  • Day pass to Pearls Kingdom Water park - 7th best water park in the world by TripAdvisor
  • Over 30 rides, a wave pool and slides to thrill all members of the family

What's included
  • All rides at Pearls Kingdom Water Park
  • Free sunbeds and life jackets available on a first come first serve basis
  • Riding tubes, as well as children’s life vests, are provided free of charge and should be used on the rides that require them
  • Free parking space available
  • For children under 80 cm the access is free
  • Free Wi-Fi Available at the Park

What's not included
  • Locker rentals and towels
  • Souvenir photos
  • Beverages and meals


Know Before You Go
• Upon arrival at the ticket redemption location situated at the park entrance, please present your printed voucher(s) in exchange for your activity. Customer Service Contact Number + 971 6 511 0555
• Operating hours 10am to 7pm. Opening and closure of Al Montazah Parks are subject to change as per the season.
• Outside food, Smoking or Drinking alcholol is strictly prohibited
• Pets are not allowed
• Swimming costume is mandatory at Pearls Kingdom water park



Dress comfortably for safe fun:
• Swimming Costumes are compulsory in Water Park.
• Street clothes, cotton wear, underwear, will not be permitted. 
• Swimsuit should be free of metal; buttons, zippers, buckles.
• Long necklaces and chains not permitted.
• Very long hair should be properly tied & put up.
• Regular diapers are not permitted in any pool or attraction. Swim diapers must be used

For your safety:
• Observe all posted rules, and follow all verbal instructions given by park personnel.
• Avoid running and diving. 
• Personal floats / sports items are not permitted.
• Obey posted age, height and health restrictions, for specific rides
• Glass bottles are prohibited

Rider responsibility:
• Children below 12 years must be accompanied and supervised at all times by an adult.
• Children below 5 years must have an adult (18 or over) 
• Please do not leave valuables unattended.  Management shall not be responsible for loss of items
• Rider assumes all risk of injury due to misuse of this slide or failure to follow the written, posted & verbal rules & regulations

Be considerate to others Lets all have a good time.
• Respect Queue lines.
• Do not use abusive language / make lewd gestures. 
• Do not take photographs of other guests.
• Outside food and beverage, or any glass items are not permitted.

Tickets:

  • Adult/Child(Above 120cm) - 183.75 AED
  • Child(80cm to120cm) - 147 AED
Are you ready for a day filled with fun and excitement? Known to be one of the best waterparks in the world, Pearls Kingdom Waterpark invites you to a day where you will go on an adventure with exciting water slides, tube rides, speed slides as well as the lazy river.  

Pearls Kingdom Waterpark is expecting to introduce you to a new world of enjoyment! This incredible wonderland boasts various curiosities from pirates to hidden treasures, from magic carpets to breathtaking palaces. Hosting over 30 aquatic rides as well as slides in total, you will be immersed in constant excitement. Whether you want to enjoy a day with your family or go on an adventure with friends, there is no doubt Pearls Kingdom Water Park will deliver something beyond your expectations!

title: Riyadh: Half-Day Guided Tour with Hotel Pickup
description:
Begin a guided half-day tour in Riyadh, starting with a visit to the historic Dirah Souq downtown, where you'll explore Saudi heritage treasures, and antique carpets, and enjoy the enticing scents of sandalwood. Witness lively auctions and discover a variety of men's clothing. Afterward, your tour includes a visit to the nearby Masmak Fort, a pivotal site in the establishment of modern Saudi Arabia, where King Abdulaziz seized control in 1902, all conveniently with hotel pick-up included.

Highlights
  • Explore Old Riyadh: Dive into the heart of the city to uncover its historical charm.
  • Dirah Souq Delights: Wander through Dirah Souq, famous for antique carpets and unique Saudi heritage items, immersed in oriental scents.
  • Sensory Journey: Experience the enchanting aromas of sandalwood and other oriental scents that fill the air as you stroll through the Souq.
  • Masmak Fort: Visit the iconic Masmak Fort, just a short walk away from the Old Souq, which played a pivotal role in the establishment of the modern Saudi Kingdom.
  • Historical Significance: Discover the rich history of the Masmak Fort, constructed in 1895 A.D. during Abdullah bin Rashid's reign, serving as a crucial military garrison.
  • Saudi Reconquest: Learn how His Majesty King Abdulaziz captured the fort in 1902, marking the beginning of the House of Saudi's reconquest of Arabia and the foundation of the present-day nation.

title: Full Day Jeddah Historical Tour
description:
Embark on a captivating full-day Jeddah tour, commencing with a hotel pickup. Cruise along the scenic Tahlia Street, A daily walk on Tahlia shows the changes that are happening in Saudi Arabia. The shops on both sides offer a variety of goods and the eateries have innumerable choices and absorbing picturesque views while our guide shares fascinating insights about Jeddah. title: Full Day Ushayger Tour with Lunch
description:
Following a two-hour drive, you will reach the enchanting Ushaiqer heritage village. This village stands as a vibrant embodiment of Najdi architecture, representing the central plateau of Saudi Arabia. Ushaiqer, with a history spanning over a millennium, served as a crucial rest stop for pilgrims traveling from regions now known as Kuwait and Iraq to fulfill their Hajj or Umrah pilgrimage in Makkah. Once there, you'll have the chance to wander through its narrow alleyways, winding between graceful traditional residences, grand palaces, and ancient mosques. Additionally, you'll have the privilege of exploring a private collection of historical antiques housed within a splendid old mansion in the village. Concluding our Ushaiqer tour, you'll be treated to a breathtaking panoramic view of the surrounding area. Following this, a delectable Arabian lunch at a traditional restaurant awaits, providing the perfect conclusion to our Ushaiqer heritage village experience before returning to Riyadh.

Highlights
  • Najdi Architecture: Explore a millennium-old village showcasing vibrant Najdi architecture.
  • Historic Pilgrimage Stop: Discover its role as a historic pilgrim stop from Kuwait and Iraq to Makkah.
  • Charming Alleyways: Wander through narrow alleyways, adorned with traditional houses and old mosques.
  • Antique Museum: Visit a private antique collection in a beautiful village house.
  • Scenic Viewpoint: Enjoy breathtaking views from an impressive viewpoint.
  • Authentic Lunch: Savor an Arabian lunch at a traditional restaurant.
  • Cultural Immersion: Immerse yourself in Saudi heritage and history.
  • Scenic Drive: Experience a scenic two-hour drive through central Saudi Arabia.
  What’s included in the ticket
  • Pick-up and drop-off at appointed hotels or locations on a sharing basis.
  • Professional and experienced driver-guide.
  • Local Lunch.

  • Personal expenses.

  • The Ushayger tour suits people of all ages, including expecting mothers.

title: Edge Of The World With Dinner
description:
Embark on an exhilarating adventure with the "Edge of the World" tour in Riyadh, where you'll be taken on a thrilling excursion to the Tuwaiq escarpment, stretching an impressive 1000 kilometers. This awe-inspiring journey will introduce you to dramatic cliff viewpoints that soar up to 300 meters high, inviting you to hike along these majestic cliffs and immerse yourself in the breathtaking vistas they offer. As you explore this natural wonder, you'll also have the opportunity to delve into Saudi culture by partaking in traditional coffee and tea ceremonies, as well as enjoying a delightful light meal.

title: Full Day Riyadh City Tour With Lunch
description:
Embark on an enriching city tour of Riyadh, starting at the National Museum, a dedicated guardian of Saudi heritage. This prestigious establishment is a haven for exploration, meticulously documenting the rich history of the Arabian Peninsula, encompassing eras from ancient times to the contemporary age. Our exploration then leads us to Murrabba Palace, once the regal abode of King Abdulaziz and now a distinguished museum. In proximity, a contemporary edifice proudly displays King Abdulaziz's personal belongings, offering an intimate glimpse into the heart of Saudi history. Following a satisfying lunch, we plunge into the enchanting realm of old Riyadh, navigating the historic Dirah Souq, celebrated for its antique treasures and captivating Friday auctions. Here, the air is redolent with the beguiling scents of sandalwood and the Orient. Our journey continues to the iconic Masmak Fort, a pivotal symbol in the creation of the modern Saudi Kingdom. Erected in 1895 as a military garrison, it bore witness to the historic capture of King Abdulaziz in 1902, signifying the resurgence of the House of Saud. To conclude our enriching experience, we ascend the Kingdom Tower and its Sky Bridge, treating us to a breathtaking 300-meter-high panoramic view of Riyadh. This all-encompassing tour seamlessly weaves together the threads of history, culture, and modernity, ensuring an unforgettable exploration of this vibrant city.

Highlights
  • National Museum: Embark on an enlightening journey with a knowledgeable tour guide at the National Museum, uncovering Saudi heritage.
  • Murrabba Palace: Discover the royal residence of King Abdulaziz and its museum showcasing his personal items.
  • Dirah Souq: Immerse in old Riyadh's charm at Dirah Souq, known for antique carpets and vibrant auctions.
  • Masmak Fort: Learn about the birth of modern Saudi Arabia at Masmak Fort, captured by King Abdulaziz in 1902.
  • Kingdom Tower: At Kingdom Tower's Sky Bridge, enjoy a panoramic view of Riyadh from 300 meters above the city.
  What’s included in the ticket
  • Pick-up and drop-off at appointed hotels or locations on a sharing basis.
  • A minimum of 2 people is required for the tour.
  • Professional and experienced driver-guide.
  • Local Lunch.
  • Entrance to National Museum, Murrabba Palace & Masmak Fort.
  • Entrance to Sky Bridge.
Exclusions
  • Any other expenses not covered in the list above.
  • Personal expenses.
Timing: 
  • The duration of the tour is approximately 08 hours.
  • The tour is available only on Monday, Wednesday, Thursday & Saturday.
  • The tour commences at 08:30 a.m., with pickup scheduled 30-60 minutes prior.
  •  Skybridge is closed until further notice.

Important things to know before your visit
Dress code: Appropriate clothing is required for the tour.
- Age and Health Restrictions:

Following a satisfying lunch, we plunge into the enchanting realm of old Riyadh, navigating the historic Dirah Souq, celebrated for its antique treasures and captivating Friday auctions. title: Muscat Dolphin Cruise With Shared Transfers
description:
Explore Oman's rich marine life, including 21 different species of dolphins and whales, including the elusive blue whale, during our guided dolphin tour. Our experienced gray line team will transport you from your hotel to the jetty, where you'll embark on a thrilling sea adventure in search of these magnificent creatures. While dolphin sightings aren't guaranteed on every trip, this journey offers a delightful and educational experience as you navigate the waters, with the possibility of spotting not only dolphins but also whales, all while our onboard cetacean specialist shares fascinating insights about these captivating marine mammals.

Highlights

title: 24 Hour Hop On Hop Off Sightseeing Tour, Doha

title: Salalah: Private Full-Day Jebel Safari Tour West
description:
Embark on an enchanting journey in Salalah with our Salalah West Tour. Begin your adventure by visiting Nabi Ayoub, perched atop Jebel Mountain, offering breathtaking views and religious significance that is a must-see in Salalah. Capture the beauty of the landscapes and mountains at a nearby viewpoint before continuing your excursion at Al Mughsail Beach, renowned for its dramatic blowholes. Don't miss a photo stop at Mughsail Lagoon, a sanctuary for migratory birds. The Zigzag Road offers magnificent sights, accompanied by the charm of Dhofar's cherished Frankincense Trees. Your tour concludes at Fizaya Beach, near Oman's border, with its turquoise waters providing a picturesque backdrop for relaxation (please note that swimming is discouraged due to strong currents). Join us for the ultimate Salalah Jebel Safari Tour, an adventure that showcases the best of this stunning region.

Highlights
  • Nabi Ayoub (Prophet Job's Tomb): Historical significance in the Quran and Bible, view from the high point in Jebel mountain.
  • Al Mughsail Beach: Blowholes with geyser-like eruptions, Mughsail Lagoon with migratory birds.
  • Zigzag Road: Magnificent views over 10-15 km, Frankincense Trees along the route.
  • Fizaya Beach: Pristine turquoise waters, advised against swimming due to strong currents.
What’s included in the ticket
  • Private car:  4WD (4 Wheel Drive 1-4 guests)
  • English-speaking driver and guide.
  • Water during the trip
Exclusions
  • Entrance fees
  • Gratuities
  • Meals unless specified
  • Any additional transfers

Timing: 
  • Tour duration: 08 Hours
Tour details: 
  • Explore Nabi Ayoub (Prophet Job's Tomb), a site of historical and religious importance.
  • Ascend Jebel Mountain for a panoramic view of Nabi Ayoub's surroundings.
  • Capture the beauty of the landscape with a photo stop at a nearby viewpoint.
  • Continue your journey to Al Mughsail Beach, renowned for its dramatic blowholes with geyser-like eruptions.
  • Pause for a photo opportunity at Mughsail Lagoon, a habitat for migratory birds.
  • Travel along the scenic Zigzag Road, spanning approximately 10 to 15 kilometers.
  • Admire the distinctive leafless Frankincense Trees, celebrated for Dhofar's finest frankincense.
  • Drive to Fizaya Beach, where pristine turquoise waters meet Oman's western border.
  • Take in the breathtaking scenery along the hairpin bend road leading to Fizaya Beach.
  • Please exercise caution when at Fizaya Beach, as strong currents and rocky coastlines make swimming unsafe.
  • The tour concludes at Fizaya Beach, wrapping up your exploration of these remarkable sites."
 
Important things to know before your visit

  • When entering religious sites, it's advisable for women to wear headscarves or a hijab-like covering, and all visitors should dress modestly. Sleeveless attire and shorts above the knee are not allowed, and shoulders must remain covered at all times.
  • The majority of the tours involve walking on uneven and slanted terrain, please wear comfortable steady, or walking shoes.
  • Guests should wear comfortable clothing and avoid wearing jewelry or expensive watches on desert trips because there is no signal at the camp/desert.
  • Please respect regional social customs and refrain from making loud noises near residential areas and religious sites.
Safety instructions:
  • Due to safety regulations, all 4WD vehicles are limited to a maximum of 4 pax per vehicle. Please observe the local photography customs. Photographing or filming inside some museums is not permitted.

title: Luxury Canal Dhow Cruise with La Perle Show
description:
Experience a serene evening cruise along the enchanting Dubai Water Canal aboard a luxurious Dhow. This exclusive experience offers the finest dining with both glass-enclosed and al fresco seating options, along with access to a mesmerizing acrobatic performance at La Perle. As you dine on a mouthwatering international buffet, you'll be treated to unparalleled views of iconic landmarks, including the Burj Khalifa and the Imagine fountain show, all while absorbing the lively ambiance of the city from a distance. Glide gracefully beneath the region's first sensor-operated waterfall bridge and be serenaded by our talented saxophonist playing your favorite melodies. Your adventure culminates with a visit to La Perle, Dubai's premier show, guaranteeing an unforgettable evening of entertainment.

Highlights
  • Marvel at iconic Dubai sights, including the skyline, Burj Khalifa, and IMAGINE Fountain Show.
  • Experience a captivating sunset cruise with an entertaining onboard atmosphere.
  • Savor traditional cuisine during a buffet dinner before attending La Perle's acrobatic show with a Silver Pass.
What’s included in the ticket

  • Welcome drinks and refreshments
  • International dinner buffet
  • Tea, coffee, and soft beverages
  • Silver Pass for La Perle
Timing: 
  • Boarding time - 6:15 p.m.
  • Cruise time - 7 p.m. to 9:30 p.m.
Ticket Information: 
  • Luxury Canal Dhow Cruise with La Perle Show ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable.
  •  Visitors are not allowed to bring food or beverages, glassware, or alcohol into Luxury Canal Dhow Cruise
  • Please carry a valid photo ID with you.
  • Prebook your tickets to redeem the best offers and deals.
  Important things to know before your visit
  • Luxury Canal Dhow Cruise with La Perle Show Dress Code: Smart casual clothing is allowed during the tour. No beachwear allowed.
  • Luxury Canal Dhow Cruise with La Perle Show Age and Health Restrictions: A visit to The Luxury Canal Dhow Cruise is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers.
How to get there:
By car: The Luxury Canal Dhow Cruise embarks from the Dubai Festival City Water Promenade which is located in Dubai Festival City Mall, which is easily accessible by car. You can park the car in mall parking free of cost.  

By public transportation: The mall is easily accessible by public transportation. There are multiple bus routes available from across the city.  

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to the mall from anywhere in Dubai. It’s a popular destination, and most taxi drivers will be familiar with the location. description:

Wake up to adventure in Dhofar! Begin with a visit to the jaw-dropping Hidden Beach, a secret paradise nestled between Al Mughsail and Fizayah. With turquoise waters and rugged cliffs, it's a photographer’s dream.

title: Salalah: Full-Day Historical East
description:
Explore some of the historical places in east Salalah at Ain Razat on this guided tour, where natural springs provide perennial water. Travel to the captivating coastal town of Taqah, renowned for its historical castle housing ancient artifacts. Continue to the hidden gem of Wadi Darbat, nestled in the mountains, showcasing waterfalls, camels, lakes, and vibrant greenery during the Khareef season. Explore Mirbat's historical treasures, including its castle, ancient Souq, and the revered Bin Ali's Tomb. Your journey culminates at Khor Rori Creek, where you'll encounter the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Sumhuram's ancient frankincense trade hub, all on this captivating historical tour of Salalah.

Highlights
  • Ain Razat: Located in Eastern Dhofar, Ain Razat boasts natural springs, including both perennial and seasonal ones during the Khareef season, serving as a reliable year-round water source for Salalah.
  • Taqah: Nestled within the coastal region of Dhofar, Taqah is a historic town renowned for its castle featuring watchtowers, stone houses, and a collection of valuable artifacts, offering a captivating glimpse into ancient life.
  • Wadi Darbat: Perched in the mountains and overlooking Khor Rori, Wadi Darbat is a picturesque park that comes alive during the Khareef season, revealing enchanting waterfalls, camels, serene lakes, and lush greenery, making it a natural wonder.
  • Mirbat: A visit to Mirbat unveils its rich history, featuring the historic Mirbat castle, the Wali's house, an old Souq, and the iconic twin-domed Bin Ali's Tomb, all showcasing medieval architecture and offering a vivid insight into Mirbat's fascinating past.
  • Khor Rori Creek: This creek houses the ruins of Sumhuram's ancient city, once the thriving center of the Arabian frankincense trade, now designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site, adding historical significance to the Land of Frankincense.
What’s included in the ticket
  • Private car:  4WD (4 Wheel Drive 1-4 guests)
  • English-speaking driver and guide.
  • Water during the trip
Exclusions
  • Entrance fees
  • Gratuities
  • Meals unless specified
  • Any additional transfers
Timing: 
  • Tour duration: 08 Hours
Tour details
  • Venture to Dhofar's eastern wonders: Ain Razat's natural springs, Taqah's captivating coastal town with a historic castle, Wadi Darbat's hidden mountain oasis, Mirbat's medieval treasures, Khor Rori Creek's ancient frankincense hub, and Sumhuram Museum's UNESCO World Heritage site detailing frankincense and copper trade history.  

Important things to know before your visit
  • When entering religious sites, it's advisable for women to wear headscarves or a hijab-like covering, and all visitors should dress modestly. Sleeveless attire and shorts above the knee are not allowed, and shoulders must remain covered at all times.
  • The majority of the tours involve walking on uneven and slanted terrain, please wear comfortable steady, or walking shoes.
  • Guests should wear comfortable clothing and avoid wearing jewelry or expensive watches on desert trips because there is no signal at the camp/desert.
  • Please respect regional social customs and refrain from making loud noises near residential areas and religious sites.
Safety instructions:
  • Due to safety regulations, all 4WD vehicles are limited to a maximum of 4 pax per vehicle. Please observe the local photography customs. Photographing or filming inside some museums is not permitted.
