title: Salalah: Full-Day Beach Escapade Al Mughsail Beach & Fazayah Beach
description:
Begin a scenic journey to Al Mughsail Beach in Salalah, Oman, renowned for its remarkable blowholes and geyser-like eruptions, a mesmerizing phenomenon triggered by seawater rushing through subterranean channels. Take in the breathtaking vistas along the Zigzag Road, where Dhofar's famous frankincense trees adorn the landscape. Pause for a photo opportunity at Mughsail Lagoon, a sanctuary for migratory birds, before continuing your expedition to Al Fazayah Beach, another captivating destination near Salalah. While the pristine turquoise waters of Al Fazayah Beach are a visual delight, exercise caution as the strong currents and rocky coastline can make swimming challenging. Immerse yourself in the picturesque scenery and unwind in this coastal oasis, situated near Oman's western border.

Highlights
  • Begin the journey at Al Mughsail Beach in Salalah, known for its captivating blowholes and geyser-like eruptions caused by pressurized seawater flow beneath the surface.
  • Capture the beauty of Mughsail Lagoon during a photo stop, a birdwatcher's paradise with diverse migratory bird species.
  • Traverse the scenic Zigzag Road, spanning approximately 10 to 15 kilometers, offering breathtaking panoramic views from elevated vantage points, with the iconic silhouette of the leafless Frankincense Tree adorning the landscape.
  • Explore the globally renowned Dhofar-grown frankincense before continuing your adventure.
  • Conclude the tour at Fizaya Beach, where the pristine turquoise waters of the Indian Ocean await, accessible through a winding coastal road near Oman's western border.
  • Relax at Al Fazayah Beach, but exercise caution if considering a swim due to the presence of strong currents and a rocky shoreline.

  • The majority of the tours involve walking on uneven and slanted terrain, please wear comfortable steady, or walking shoes.
  • Guests should wear comfortable clothing and avoid wearing jewelry or expensive watches on desert trips because there is no signal at the camp/desert.
  • Please respect regional social customs and refrain from making loud noises near residential areas and religious sites.

Embark on a scenic adventure to Al Mughsail Beach in Salalah, Oman—famed for its natural blowholes that shoot seawater skyward through hidden underground passages, creating a thrilling spectacle of nature.  

As you wind your way along the picturesque Zigzag Road, marvel at the rolling hills of Dhofar dotted with ancient frankincense trees. Make a brief stop at Mughsail Lagoon, a peaceful haven for migratory birds and a perfect photo opportunity.   Continue on to Al Fazayah Beach, where dramatic cliffs and clear turquoise waters await.   

Though its rugged beauty is captivating, be mindful of strong currents and rocky shores, which make swimming risky. Instead, take in the serene landscape and let the unspoiled coastline near Oman’s western border leave you in awe.

title: Salalah: Private Full-Day Jebel Safari Tour East
description:
Embark on the Salalah East Tour, exploring the perennial and seasonal springs of Ain Razat, visiting the historic coastal town of Taqah with its castle of ancient artifacts, continuing to the hidden natural wonderland of Wadi Darbat featuring waterfalls, camels, lakes, and lush greenery, discovering the dramatic Tawi Ateer and Teeq Sinkholes/Caves, journeying through the majestic Jebel Samhan mountain range with a 2100m peak, and experiencing the Salalah Anti-Gravity Point, where cars seemingly defy gravity on hills, making this a truly extraordinary adventure in Oman's captivating landscapes.

Highlights
  • Ain Razat: Located east of Dhofar, featuring perennial and seasonal springs, serving as Salalah's primary water source.
  • Taqah: A coastal town with historical significance, known for its old fishing village, castle adorned with watchtowers, stone houses, and a collection of ancient artifacts.
  • Wadi Darbat: Nestled in the mountains, it transforms during the Khareef season with waterfalls, camels, serene lakes, intriguing caves, lush greenery, and a perfect picnic area.
  • Tawi Ateer Sinkhole: A famous natural marvel in the Salalah Mountains, boasting a depth of 211 meters and requiring a guided rocky descent to explore.
  • Teeq Sinkhole/Cave: Located 14 kilometers from Tawi Ateer, this massive cavity plunges 130-150 meters into the earth, offering an awe-inspiring experience.
  • Jebel Samhan: A major mountain range with the highest peak soaring to 2100 meters, covering an extensive area of 4500 square kilometers.
  • Babul Tree Photo Stop: Pause to capture a memorable photo moment with a striking Babul tree (Baobab).
  • Salalah Anti-Gravity Point: Witness the unique phenomenon where cars effortlessly climb hills in Neutral gear at speeds of 40-60 km/hr, providing an extraordinary experience.

  • Private car:  4WD (4 Wheel Drive 1-4 guests)
  • English-speaking driver and guide.

title: Abu Dhabi: Afternoon City Tour With Qasr Al Watan & Grand Mosque
description:
Uncover the rich heritage of the UAE on an enlightening Abu Dhabi afternoon city tour. Begin with Qasr Al Watan, the Presidential Palace, a stunning testament to Arabian artistry and luxury. Continue your exploration with the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, a masterpiece of architecture and a symbol of cultural unity. This afternoon tour promises a journey through the cultural tapestry, revealing the legacy and charm that define Abu Dhabi's captivating allure.

Highlights

•  Experience the glittering city, the capital of the United Arab Emirates from all angels
•  Visit one of the largest mosques in the world, Sheikh Zayed Mosque
•  Feel the grandeur as you enter the grounds of Qasr Al Watan  

What’s included in the ticket

•  Pick-up and drop-off from selected locations on sharing basis
•  Admission to Qasr Al Watan
•  Admission to Sheikh Zayed Mosque
•  Guide
•  Bottled drinking water  

What’s not included in the ticket

•  Meals
•  Other personal expenses  

Timing's & Tour Details

•  Tour Duration: 05 Hours
•  Pick Up: 15:00-16:00
•  Drop off: 20:00-20:30
•  Operating days: Sunday, Monday, Wednesday & Friday.


Important things to know before your visit

•  Entrance to the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque is not guaranteed during Islamic holidays
•  Please pay strict attention to the dress code inside the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque
•  Pick Up will be done from these locations in Abu Dhabi: Yas Island, Saadiyat Island & Abu Dhabi City
•  Age and Health Restrictions:Visit is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers. Uncover the rich heritage of the UAE on an enlightening Abu Dhabi afternoon city tour. Begin with Qasr Al Watan, the Presidential Palace, a stunning testament to Arabian artistry and luxury. Continue your exploration with the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, a masterpiece of architecture and a symbol of cultural unity. title: The National Aquarium + Louvre Abu Dhabi - Combo
description:
Embark on a captivating journey with the Combo: The National Aquarium + Louvre Abu Dhabi. Delve into the depths of marine wonders at The National Aquarium, where over 65,000 marine creatures and educational initiatives converge to create an immersive experience. From sharks to dolphins and virtual reality adventures, it's a celebration of marine diversity and conservation. Transition seamlessly to the architectural masterpiece of Louvre Abu Dhabi, designed by Jean Nouvel. Wander through galleries adorned with global masterpieces, from da Vinci to Van Gogh, and witness a "rain of light" under the iconic dome. The Combo invites you to a day of exploration, seamlessly blending the enchanting realms of marine life and the boundless expressions of human creativity.


Highlights

  • Explore the inaugural global museum boasting diverse art galleries.
  • Marvel at the distinct Louvre architecture designed by renowned architect Jean Nouvel.
  • Discover the 10 natural zones including UAE’s Natural Treasures, Red Sea Wreck, Atlantic Cave, Ocean Magic, and Frozen Ocean at Al Qana National Aquarium Abu Dhabi
  • Get up close with 200+ sharks at the aquarium at the biggest aquarium in Abu Dhabi.
  • Learn more about the underwater world and explore rare species you have never seen before including the Abu Dhabi aquarium snake at the biggest fish aquarium in Abu Dhabi.


What’s included in the ticket

  • Entry to Louvre Abu Dhabi
  • Entry to The National Aquarium
  • Enjoy the flexibility with our Combo offer – each ticket is valid for 14 days, and usable independently.

Timings: 


Louvre Abu Dhabi Timings:

Tues to Thurs, 10 a.m. to 6:30 p.m.
Fri to Sun, 10 a.m. to 8:30 p.m.
Museum Closed on Mondays.

Please note the following adjustments to ensure your visit is enjoyable and well-planned, Operating hours on Saturday, April 27th, due to a special event.

  • The museum will close early at 7:00 PM.
  • The last entry for all museum ticket holders will be at 5:30 PM.
  • Our dining facilities, including Fouquet's, Art Lounge, and Ethr, will be closed throughout the day. Museum café remains the same opening hours.
  •  

National Aquarium Abu Dhabi Timings:

‚ó¶ 10 a.m. to 10 p.m.



Important things to know before your visit

  • Dress Code: Casual, appropriate clothing is allowed at both locations. No beachwear allowed.
Age and Health Restrictions:
  • A visit to both locations is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers.
  • Kids under 13 must be accompanied by an adult at Louvre Abu Dhabi.
  • Children under 12 years old must be accompanied by an adult aged 16 years or above at The National Aquarium.
  • Accessibility: The entire Louvre Abu Dhabi & The National Aquarium experience is wheelchair accessible.
  • Visitors are not allowed to bring food or beverages, glassware, or alcohol into the premises.

How to get there:

The National Aquarium Abu Dhabi 

- By car: The National Aquarium is located on Al Qana Walk in Abu Dhabi, which is easily accessible by car. You can park the car in the designated public parking for a small fee.

- By public transportation: The National Aquarium is easily accessible by public transport. There are multiple bus routes available to the destination from around Abu Dhabi.

- By taxi: You can also take a taxi to the location from anywhere in Abu Dhabi. It’s a popular destination, and most taxi drivers will be familiar with the location.

Louvre Abu Dhabi

- By car:  Louvre Abu Dhabi is located in Al Saadiyat Island, Abu Dhabi and is easily accessible by car. You can park the car in the museum’s parking free of cost.

- By public transportation: The museum is easily accessible by public transportation with multiple bus routes available from across Abu Dhabi

- By taxi: You can also take a taxi to the museum from anywhere in Dubai or Abu Dhabi. It’s a popular destination, and most taxi drivers will be familiar with the location.

Embark on a captivating journey with the Combo: The National Aquarium + Louvre Abu Dhabi. Delve into the depths of marine wonders at The National Aquarium, where over 65,000 marine creatures and educational initiatives converge to create an immersive experience. From sharks to dolphins and virtual reality adventures, it's a celebration of marine diversity and conservation. Transition seamlessly to the architectural masterpiece of Louvre Abu Dhabi, designed by Jean Nouvel. Wander through galleries adorned with global masterpieces, from da Vinci to Van Gogh, and witness a "rain of light" under the iconic dome. The combo invites you to a day of exploration, seamlessly blending the enchanting realms of marine life and the boundless expressions of human creativity.

title: Mussandam Sea Safari Tour With Lunch From Dubai
description:
Embark on an enchanting odyssey from Dubai to Oman's breathtaking Musandam Peninsula. Traverse the rugged Hajar Mountains, cross borders, and set sail on an Arabian wooden 'dhow.' Glide along the world's most stunning coast, adorned with rocky coves, barren peaks, and fjord-like bays. Sunbathe, spot dolphins, and indulge in swimming and snorkeling in crystal-clear waters. Relish a delectable buffet lunch on deck, surrounded by nature's wonders, before journeying back to Dubai‚Äîa day of unparalleled beauty and adventure awaits.


What to Expect:

Experience a breathtaking day trip from Dubai to Oman's Musandam Peninsula, immersing yourself in the stunning landscapes of rocky mountains, fjord-like bays, and translucent waters while enjoying activities such as dolphin watching, swimming, snorkeling, and a delightful buffet lunch aboard an Arabian wooden 'dhow.'

Highlights:

  • Discover the pristine waters of Musandam and the Gulf of Oman.
  • Look for dolphins and swim and snorkel in the blue-green waters.
  • Climb aboard a traditional dhow and cruise across the turquoise waters.
  • Enjoy a buffet lunch aboard the boat.
  • Admire the towering peaks of the Hajar Mountains.
  • Explore hidden caves and sheltered bays
What’s included in the ticket:
  • Pick up and drop off on the Sharing basis
  • English Driver cum guide
  • Full-day cruise experience with lunch and soft drinks on the boat.
Exclusions:
  • Personal expenses
  • Alcoholic Drinks
Itinerary:

Book your boat trip to DIBBA with Gray Line for a serene journey through the Gulf of Oman. Explore the breathtaking Musandam region, known for its peaceful coastlines, Hajar Mountains, and diverse marine life. Discover hidden caves, bays, and pebble beaches, with sheltered bays perfect for safe snorkeling. Marvel at the rich marine diversity, including fish, corals, turtles, and invertebrates. Embark on a dhow trip into the Fjords of Musandam, revealing a landscape of natural sea caves and providing an ambiance of peace. Keep an eye out for dolphins during the cruise and enjoy lunch on board. Traditional dhows feature comfortable seating, cushions, and carpets. Experience sea safaris, snorkeling, swimming, and admire Oman's limestone houses from the comfort of your boat. Request snorkeling equipment in advance for an enhanced exploration of the wonders beneath the waves.

Additional Information:
  • Tour departure time: 07:00 hrs, but pick up is 30- 60 minutes before
  • Tour Duration: 9 hours
Important things to know before your visit. 
  • Smoking is prohibited in all our vehicles
  • Before Photographing any local residents, kindly ask their permission
  • Photographing local ladies is not permitted
  • Schedules are likely to change during the Holy Month of Ramadan. Please contact our representative for updates
Experience an extraordinary day trip from Dubai to Oman's Musandam Peninsula, immersing yourself in the stunning landscapes of rocky mountains, fjord-like bays, and translucent waters. Enjoy activities like dolphin watching, swimming, snorkeling, and relish a delightful buffet lunch aboard an authentic Arabian wooden 'dhow' on your Musandam tour. This Mussandam Dibba tour offers a unique cruise experience, allowing you to explore the beauty of Oman's Musandam Peninsula from Dubai.

title: IMAGINARY ART Show in KRASOTA Restaurant
description:
You‚Äôre not in a gallery. You‚Äôre inside the masterpieces ‚Äî and every course draws you deeper. At KRASOTA Dubai, Imaginary Art is a fully immersive AI-powered gastro-show, where eight iconic artworks from the late 19th and early 20th centuries come alive through food, projection, sound, and storytelling. Seated in an intimate theatre for just 20 guests, you‚Äôll move through scenes inspired by the visionaries of modern art ‚Äî from Vrubel‚Äôs mysticism to Chagall‚Äôs dreamscapes, from Malevich‚Äôs radical forms to the silent geometry of early modernism. Each moment is paired with a course by Michelin-starred chef Vladimir Mukhin, transforming visual language into edible expression. You don‚Äôt need to know art ‚Äî just arrive ready to feel it.

You’re not in a gallery. You’re inside the masterpieces — and every course draws you deeper.

At KRASOTA Dubai, Imaginary Art is a fully immersive AI-powered gastro-show, where eight iconic artworks from the late 19th and early 20th centuries come alive through food, projection, sound, and storytelling.

Seated in an intimate theatre for just 20 guests, you’ll move through scenes inspired by the visionaries of modern art — from Vrubel’s mysticism to Chagall’s dreamscapes, from Malevich’s radical forms to the silent geometry of early modernism.

title: Adrenark Adventure Park
description:
Adrenark Adventure Park: Thrilling fun for all ages, featuring roller gliders, obstacle courses, rock climbing, hiking trails, and E-karting. Unforgettable adventures starting at 2 years old.



What to expect:

Adrenark: Unleash excitement in the region's largest indoor park! Dive into thrilling activities for all ages, indulge in delectable treats at our Food Court, and prioritize safety in a controlled environment. Create unforgettable moments with family and friends in an immersive atmosphere at Adrenark—where entertainment meets adventure.


Highlights:

  • Toddler Pass: Ideal for 2+ years, includes Playland, Bungee, Dune Safari, or Valo Jump, with 3 single-day admissions (excluding Karting).
  • Discovery Pass: Pick 6 out of 18 experiences for a single-day adventure (excluding Karting).
  • Adventure Pass: Choose 8 experiences from 18, get a bonus free game, and enjoy 9 single-day admissions (excluding Karting).
  • Get Tired Playing: Unlimited access to all 18 experiences for a single day, excluding Karting.


Inclusions:

Toddler Pass:
  • Age Group: For children 2+ years old.
  • Included Experiences:
    • Playland
    • Bungee
    • Dune Safari
    • Valo Jump
  • Admissions: 3 admissions for single-day use.
  • Exclusions: Karting not included.
Discovery Pass:
  • Choose any 6 experiences out of 18.
  • Single-day use for the selected 6 experiences.
  • Included Experiences: Choose from a pool of 18 experiences.
  • Exclusions: Karting not included.
Adventure Pass:
  • Select any 8 experiences out of 18.
  • Includes an additional free game.
  • 9 admissions for single-day use.
  • Included Experiences: Choose from a pool of 18 experiences.
  • Exclusions: Karting not included.
Get Tired Playing:
  • Unlimited access to all 18 experiences.
  • Single-day pass.
  • Exclusions: Karting not included.

Timings: 
  • Sunday - Thursday :  10 a.m. to 10 p.m.
  • Friday - Saturday : 10 a.m. to 12 a.m.


Important things to know before your visit

  • Safety Equipment: Helmets, harnesses, and ropes are mandatory for certain activities; non-compliance may lead to injury or death.

  • No Outside Equipment: Bringing personal equipment like ropes or helmets is not allowed within the park.

  • No Food or Drink: Except for water, guests cannot bring food or drinks; options are available for purchase at designated areas.

  • Follow Staff Instructions: Guests must adhere to park staff instructions or face possible ejection.

  • No Alcohol or Drugs: Entry is denied to those under the influence; consumption within the park is strictly prohibited.

  • Dress Code: Appropriate clothing is required; too loose or tight attire may pose safety risks.

  • Health Conditions: Guests with specific health conditions must inform staff before participating in activities.

  • No Smoking: Smoking is strictly forbidden within the park.

  • No Pets: With the exception of service animals, pets are not allowed.

  • Photography and Video Recording: Personal photography is allowed; commercial use requires written consent from park management.

  • Prohibited Items: Weapons, illegal drugs, and other dangerous items are strictly banned.

  • Queue Lines: Guests must follow queue lines, and cutting is strictly prohibited, with potential ejection.



Discover boundless excitement at Adrenark Adventure Park in Abu Dhabi, the region's largest indoor park. Experience thrilling activities suitable for all ages, savor delectable treats at our Food Court, and enjoy a safe and controlled environment. Make lasting memories with loved ones in an immersive atmosphere where entertainment seamlessly intertwines with adventure.

title: Dubai Marina Luxury Sunset Yacht Tour

title: Mleiha ArchaeoMOG tour
description:
Hop into our latest adventure to experience the sights and sounds of Mleiha on our exciting ArchaeoMOG tour! Guests will be taken through a variety of different locations in a specially designed UNIMOG ‚Äì your experience will begin with a tour of the museum, followed by a walkthrough to the Mleiha Stables via our gazelle enclosure, journeying onwards in the UNIMOG to the Valley of the Caves for a short trekking experience and crossing the old quarries to reach the final stop in a hidden wadi for refreshments. Meliha in the Emirate of Sharjah blends history, nature and culture with exceptional quality and warm hospitality to create a unique leisure experience in a spectacular natural setting. It is a story that‚Äôs still being told so come and discover the undiscovered!

Timing and Duration

2 Hours 

Open Hours 

9:30 a.m. to 2 hours before sunset


Highlights 
  • Feel the thrill of riding in a UNIMOG in the sand dunes of Mleiha
  • Take a closer look at the wide variety of artefacts on display at the Mleiha Archaeological Museum


Inclusions & Exclusions

Inclusions:
  • 2 hours an adventure to experience the sights and sounds of Mleiha in a specially designed UNIMOG
  • Entry to Mleiha Archaeological Museum
  • Visit to Mleiha Stables and Gazelle enclosure.
  • Visit to the Valley of the Caves.
  • Refreshments at Faya Mountain.



Exclusions:
  • Any other expenses not covered in the list above.
  • Personal expenses.
  • Food and drinks
  • Hotel pickup and drop-off
** Exclusive return transfers at additional cost- SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY - Rate will be based on your location**

  • A minimum of 2 people per booking is required.

  • Children aged up to 5 years old will enjoy complimentary admission with no charges
  • The tour is conducted in English Language only


How to get there


By car: The Mleiha Archaeological Centre is easily accessible by car. Follow Al Dhaid Road (E88) eastward and follow the signs leading to the center.

title: Mleiha Panorama Lounge (Non Exclusive)
description:
Indulge in the newly launched Mleiha Panorama Lounge, offering an immersive experience with stunning panoramic views of Jebel Faya and the Mleiha desert. Relax in the luxurious Arabian Majlis seating while sipping on traditional hot beverages like Qahwa and Karak. As the sun sets, casting golden and amber hues across the desert and sky, families can engage in various activities. The lounge boasts a dedicated games area with swings and slides for children, providing a family-friendly atmosphere. Unwind and create lasting memories at the Mleiha Panorama Lounge, your haven for breathtaking vistas and delightful moments.

Timings

3-4 Hours Maximum

Open Hours

From 05:00 p.m. to 11:00 p.m.


Highlights
  • Enjoy the breathtaking panoramic views of Jebel Faya and the Mleiha desert while savoring traditional hot beverages.
  • Families can delight in the dedicated games area featuring swings and slides for the little ones, along with captivating games like Carrom and giant Jenga for the entire family.
  • Enjoy the magical atmosphere as the sunset transforms the desert landscape, creating a mesmerizing backdrop for your time at the Panorama Lounge.


Inclusions & Exclusions

Inclusions:

  • Majlis Area 
  • Dining & Bonfire Area 
  • Views of Jebel Faya & Gazelle Enclosure 
  • Kids' Games Area (Swings, Slides) 
  • Family Games (Carrom, Giant Jenga etc.) 
  • Water & Soft Drinks 
  • Traditional Hot Beverages (Qahwa, Karak) 

Exclusions:
  • Food
  • Hotel pickup and drop-off

  • Confirmation will be received at the time of booking, subject to availability
  • Exclusive return transfers at an additional price 
  • Children up to 5 years old get complimentary admission
  • Optional add-ons are available at extra cost (20 minutes each)
  • The experience is not recommended for pregnant women
  • Guests can use desert campsite toilet facilities
  • Enhance with add-ons like Sunset Drive SUV or Dune Buggy, subject to availability

How to get there

By car: Pick-up is not provided for this tour. You need to drive to Mleiha Archaeological Centre which is easily accessible by car. You can park in the designated area for parking once you reach the destination. Indulge in the newly launched Mleiha Panorama Lounge, offering an immersive experience with stunning panoramic views of Jebel Faya and the Mleiha desert. Relax in the luxurious Arabian Majlis seating while sipping on traditional hot beverages like Qahwa and Karak.

As the sun sets, casting golden and amber hues across the desert and sky, families can engage in various activities. The lounge boasts a dedicated games area for children, providing a family-friendly atmosphere.

Unwind and create lasting memories at the Mleiha Panorama Lounge, your haven for breathtaking vistas and delightful moments.

title: Mleiha Stargazing
description:
Experience a delightful evening under the stars with our guided celestial exploration event. Indulge in traditional refreshments in our lounge while knowledgeable guides provide insights into various celestial objects such as planets, stars, clusters, nebulae, and the moon. Please note that the visibility of these objects depends on local weather conditions.

1 Hour

Exclusions:

title: Mleiha Overnight Camping -  Panoramic Lounge
description:
. Embark on an enchanting Mleiha overnight camping adventure, immersing yourself in an authentic desert experience beneath star-filled skies.

Follow your experienced guide into the dunes, indulging in refreshments and stargazing through a telescope. Knowledgeable guides provide insights about celestial objects.

Conclude the night with a memorable sunrise drive and a short walk around the stunning Fossil Rock vistas. Discover the magic of overnight desert camping in UAE's Sharjah at Mleiha.

title: Dolphin & Seal Show - Dubai Dolphinarium + The Green Planet Dubai - Combo
description:
Experience the captivating display as local dolphins and seals showcase their skills in a lively performance at the dolphinarium, guided by expert trainers. Your ticket also grants you access to The Green Planet in Dubai, where you can explore an indoor tropical forest featuring over 3000 species, including sloths, toucans, and piranhas.

Highlights
  • Explore the massive Dubai Dolphinarium with advanced marine facilities.
  • Experience a unique 45-minute show featuring the best seals and dolphins in the city.
  • Be astounded by the magical skills of the resident acrobat master and illusionist Max.
  • Interact and get up close with the animals for a once-in-a-lifetime experience.
  • Learn more about the habits and behaviors of the mammals.
  • Explore the only indoor tropical rainforest in Dubai with 5 unique tropical forest systems
  • Discover the largest indoor life-sustaining tree in the world

What’s included in the ticket
  • Entry to the dolphinarium
  • 45-minute dolphin and seal show
  • Entry to The Green Planet
  • Includes full day access to Nature Park
  • Entry to the City Walk Zoo
  • Access to the 5 tropical rainforest levels

Operational Timings

Dolphin & Seal Show - Dubai Dolphinarium

- Wednesday - Monday, 11 a.m., 2 p.m. and 5 p.m.
- Tuesday, closed.

The Green Planet

- Opening Hours: 11:00 a.m. to 06:00 p.m.


Ticket Information

Dolphin & Seal Show - Dubai Dolphinarium

  • Dolphin and Seal Show ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable.
  • It is recommended to arrive 45 minutes early to secure a seat.
  • Visitors are not allowed to bring food or beverages, glassware, or alcohol into the dolphinarium.
  • Please carry a valid photo ID with you.
  • A 5 AED Creek Park entry fee will be charged additionally upon your visit.


The Green Planet

  • The Green Planet ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable.
  • Visitors are not allowed to bring food or beverages, glassware, or alcohol into the premises.
  • Please carry a valid photo ID with you.
  • We recommend pre-booking your tickets online to avoid any disappointment.

Important things to know before your visit
  • Dolphin and Seal Show & The Green Planet Dress code : Casual; appropriate clothing is allowed inside Dolphin and Seal Show & The Green Planet. No beachwear allowed.
  •  Age and Health Restrictions: A visit to Dolphin and Seal Show & The Green Planet is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers.
  • Accessibility: Dolphin and Seal Show & The Green Planet is wheelchair accessible and suitable for people of determination.

How to get there

Dubai Dolphinarium

By car: Dubai Dolphinarium is located in Creek Park, which is easily accessible by car. You can easily park the car in designated parking free of cost. 

By public transportation: The dolphinarium is easily accessible by public transportation. If you are taking the metro, you can get off at the Dubai Healthcare City station and take a short walk to the location. 

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to the dolphinarium from anywhere in Dubai. It’s a popular destination, and most taxi drivers will be familiar with the location.

The Green Planet

By car: The Green Planet is located on City Walk, which is easily accessible by car. You can park at The City Walk parking for 4 hours, free of cost.  

By public transportation: City Walk is easily accessible by public transportation. If you are taking the metro, you can get off at the Dubai Mall/Burj Khalifa station and take another bus or hail a taxi to City Walk.  

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to the hotel from anywhere in Dubai. It’s a popular destination, and most taxi drivers will be familiar with the location.


Address

Dubai Dolphinarium: Creek Park Gate 1, Dubai Dolphinarium Building, Umm Hurair 2, Dubai. UAE

The Green Planet: City Walk, Al Safa St - Al Wasl, Dubai, UAE Experience the captivating display as local dolphins and seals showcase their skills in a lively performance at the dolphinarium, guided by expert trainers.

Your ticket also grants you access to The Green Planet in Dubai, where you can explore an indoor tropical forest featuring over 3000 species, including sloths, toucans, and piranhas.

title: Buffet Dinner at Mundo - Saturday to Sunday
description:
The weekend dinner buffet at Mundo Restaurant Dubai is a culinary journey that caters to all tastes and preferences. Delight in savory meat dishes, vibrant salads, and a live meat carving station that showcases skilled chefs carving succulent cuts of meat before your eyes. The sushi station is a must-visit for those craving fresh and delicious sushi rolls, sashimi, and nigiri. Customize your own pasta dishes at the pasta station, where guests can choose from a variety of sauces, toppings, and types of pasta.

  • Located in close proximity to the Museum of the Future, Mundo Restaurant offers a diverse international buffet selection.

Not Included:

title: IMAGINARY FUTURE Show in KRASOTA Restaurant
description:
Indulge in the most futuristic performance with the ‚ÄúImaginary Future‚Äù show ‚Äì an unparalleled, AI-empowered multisensory dining experience that explores numerous potential scenarios of the future that may unfold with equal likelihood or not happen at all. Guests can anticipate seven captivating stories, each presenting a futuristic view of humanity's development. From the conquest of universes to the mastery of time, construction of megacities on the ocean floor, or world domination by artificial intelligence, every unfolding story is a magnificent exploration of "what if‚Ä¶‚Äù Specially created by Michelin-starred chef Vladimir Mukhin, the 8-course menu is designed with a futuristic flair, showcasing unexpected tastes and exploring the future of gastronomy. Gault&Millau UAE guide 2024, 2 toques restaurant.

Schedule:
  • Welcome section: You will be greeted with utmost elegance in the opulent pink hall, where you will be served 3 lavish appetizers.
  • Show section: Following the warm welcome, you will be ushered into a private room with an intimate capacity of 20 guests, where you will be transported to the realms of the future, and indulge in the seven novellas paired with the set menu. The team of experienced waiters will take you on a storytelling adventure, narrating the meaning of every scene and dish.
  • Terrace access: guests of the shows have exclusive access to the terrace, which seamlessly extends the cozy and luxurious ambiance of the KRASOTA itself and offers a relaxed space to continue the evening, with free delights and an extended bar menu.
Welcome Part:  30 minutes duration.
Main Show:  2 hours duration.
Terrace Access:  until 00:00
  • Drinks are not included in the ticket price.
  • We consider all food allergies and intolerances in tailored menu preparation.

What if dinner could take you to another world?

At KRASOTA Dubai, “Imaginary Future” is not just a meal — it’s a fully immersive AI-powered gastro-show for just 20 guests, where theatre, technology, and haute cuisine merge into one sensory journey.

Across eight visionary stories — from underwater megacities to AI takeovers — you’ll explore imagined futures through taste, visuals, sound, and narration. Each scene is paired with a dish created by Michelin-starred chef Vladimir Mukhin, crafted to reflect the story on your plate.

No sci-fi knowledge is needed — just bring curiosity.
You’ll leave with more than a memory — you’ll leave transformed.

title: Evening Luxury Heritage Safari at Al Marmoom Bedouin Experience
description:
Al Marmoom Bedouin experience is surely a once-in-a-life-time treat! Tour Al Marmoom Desert Reserve in a vintage car and witness the alluring beauty of the endless desert and animals. Explore the ancient Bedouin Village while participating in various activities and enjoy a 3-course Bedouin Dinner. End your heritage safari with a mesmerizing view of the night sky by stargazing with a telescope. This luxury desert safari in Dubai, UAE will be an experience to remember! Get your tickets for the desert evening safari Dubai luxury tour now.

Highlights

  • Tour Al Marmoom in an open-air Vintage G Class, take photos and spot desert animals on the ride.
  • Experience the thrill and excitement of riding a camel caravan through the golden desert sands.
  • Explore the Bedouin village and take wonderful pictures with the falcon.
  • In the Bedouin village, savor a 3-course meal that includes an appetizer, main course and dessert.
  • Enjoy a stargazing session with a telescope and admire the mesmerizing beauty of the night sky.

What's Included in the ticket
  • Pick-up and drop-off in a modern air-conditioned vehicle at your hotel in Dubai
  • Safari ride in an open-air Vintage G Class (30-40 minutes ride)
  • Traditional welcome at the authentic Bedouin Village
  • Camel caravan ride (10-12 minutes and can be repeated twice)
  • Live Arabic coffee-making session
  • Arabian makeover (Kandura for men, Abaya for women to be returned after use)
  • Take photos with a falcon 
  • Authentic 3-course Bedouin dinner (set menu)
  • Bedouin entertainments
  • Stargazing session with a telescope


What’s not included in the ticket

  • Expenses that are not mentioned
  • Tipping (not mandatory, but appreciated)


Ramadan Update:

  • There will be no khaliji dance shows during Ramadan


Important things to know before your visit

  • The duration of the tour includes both pick-up and drop-off timings as well.
  • Tour duration is fixed for all tours/activities, but it may vary depending on the city traffic.
  • The Safari Captain will send a confirmation of the pick-up time a few hours before the tour starts.
  • Pregnant women and people with back or neck problems should consider their condition before deciding to participate in this activity.
  • Confirmation will be received at the time of booking.
  • Children below 5 years old are not permitted to join the camel ride. They will need to stay with an adult at the Bedouin village or follow the camel caravan
  • At the village, there are Bedouin tents, a restored well, cooking stations, farm animals, and more.
  • It is not recommended to carry expensive items. We accept no responsibility for any lost belongings during the trip.
  • Tour Operator accepts no responsibility for any damage, loss, accident, sickness, injury, or death that you or anyone else may suffer or incur arising out of the activities and/or in connection with your contract with us and/or the operator of any activities. You are advised to have comprehensive travel and health insurance. All personal effects are at your sole risk at all times during the activity. You understand and accept the potential risks and hazards that can be involved in certain activities. You take responsibility for ensuring that you are mentally and physically capable of participating in a particular activity.
  • This tour is not wheelchair accessible.

title: Dolphin Bay Experiences at Atlantis The Palm
description:
Take part in a once-in-a-lifetime experience and swim with the friendly bottlenose dolphins at Atlantis the Palm Dolphin Bay. Encounter the beautiful mammals up close and develop a life-long appreciation for the earth's amazing marine life during this amazing show.




Choose from one of the two Dolphin Bay experiences at Atlantis The Palm.

Dolphin Encounter
Explore the habits and behaviors of the Dolphins with an exciting dip & play experience with the Atlantis specialist team, perfect for non-swimmers and people of all ages.

Dolphin Swim
Deep dive into the water to swim and interact with the hotel’s resident Dolphins as you learn more about their habits from the specialist team.

Dolphin Meet & Great 
An engaging and educational dolphin encounter where you'll meet our resident dolphins, capture memories with a complimentary printed photo, discover fascinating facts about their anatomy, witness their energetic and natural behaviors, and conclude with a behind-the-scenes tour showcasing our expert care for these amazing creatures.

Dolphin Kayak
Embark on a breathtaking kayak adventure in the stunning Dolphin Bay Lagoon, where you'll be joined by friendly resident dolphins amidst a backdrop of lush tropical surroundings. Prepare for enchantment as these naturally curious creatures approach your kayak, offering a truly magical encounter. 

Dolphin Paddle
Embark on a serene paddle through the picturesque Dolphin Bay lagoon, honing your balance skills while enjoying the company of curious, playful, and amiable resident dolphins. This extraordinary experience offers a unique blend of relaxation for the mind and body, coupled with the opportunity to learn about their captivating behaviors in an enjoyable and interactive manner

Highlights

• Visit one of the world's most sophisticated dolphin habitats located in Atlantis The Palm
• Interact and play with the Dolphins in this unique experience
• Learn more about the habits and behaviors of Dolphins from the specialist team.
• Enjoy other experiences in the hotel including the private beach, Aquaventure Atlantis Waterpark, and the Surf Rider Wave Machine


What’s included in the ticket

• 30 minutes Dolphin experience.
• Access to 100+ rides and attractions inside Aquaventure Waterpark Dubai
• Wetsuits, towels, locker and shower facilities.
• Water bottles.
• Educational briefing.
• Same day access to Aquaventure Waterpark and its private beach.
• Parking


Timings: 

•  Operational Timings: 09:00 am to 4:30 p.m. 
•  Your activity time or visit time will depend on the time you chose at the time of checkout.


Ticket Information: 

• Dolphin Bay Experiences At Atlantis Ticket Price:
  ‚óæ Adults (7+ years): from 162.94 USD

• Visitors are not allowed to bring food or beverages, glassware, or alcohol into Dolphin Bay
• Please carry a valid photo ID with you.

• You must be able to understand safety instructions conducted in English.

Important things to know before your visit

• Dolphin Bay Experience at Atlantis Dress Code: You must wear a swimsuit under the wetsuit provided at the premises

• Dolphin Bay Experience at Atlantis Age and Health Restrictions
   ‚ó¶ Minimum age is 8 years old unless participating in Dolphin Meet & Greet or Dolphin Encounter where the experiences are appropriate for all ages.
   ‚ó¶ Participants under 12 years old must be accompanied by a paying and participating adult.
   ‚ó¶ Not suitable for pregnant women unless participating in Dolphin Meet & Greet.
   ‚ó¶ If you have any severe medical conditions you should not participate.

Prepare for enchantment as these naturally curious creatures approach your kayak, offering a truly magical encounter. 

Dolphin Paddle Embark on a serene paddle through the picturesque Dolphin Bay lagoon, honing your balance skills while enjoying the company of curious, playful, and amiable resident dolphins. This extraordinary experience offers a unique blend of relaxation for the mind and body, coupled with the opportunity to learn about their captivating behaviors in an enjoyable and interactive manner

title: Bursa and Uludag Mountain Day Trip with Lunch from Istanbul
description:
Escape the bustling streets of Istanbul and unwind with an official guide on a full-day nature trip to Bursa. Unlike cultural or history tours, this excursion allows you to explore the landmarks of the second capital of the Ottoman Empire, including Uludaƒü (Olympus Mountain) the Green Mosque and Green Tomb. Take a cable car from Uludag Mountain to the city, or optional for free time to rent an ATV or simply relax. Tour Timing: 

Duration:13 Hours
Open: The tour starts at approximately 09:00 a.m. & ends around 10:30 p.m.

Itinerary:

  • Take in the breathtaking panoramic views of the area on a cable car.
  • Admire the captivating architecture of Bursa's Green Mosque & Green Tomb.
  • Indulge in the rich and vibrant flavors of Turkish cuisine with a delectable local mixed grill lunch.
  • Taste traditional Turkish products, including Turkish delight, honey, and jam.
Embark on an unforgettable Bursa tour, starting with a across the iconic Bosphorus Bridge, connecting the continents of Europe and Asia. Ride a ferry and across the Izmit Gulf, if group have enough time, stop (approximately 60 minute) for rest and optional ride Quad Bike in Yalova.  

Explore the historic and cultural wonders of Bursa, including the wonderful Inkaya Plane Tree, the iconic Green Mosque and the serene Green Tomb. Ascend the majestic Uludaƒü Mountain for panoramic views, nature and perhaps indulge in some winter sports or simply revel in the breathtaking scenery.  

Explore the sweet side of Turkey with a visit to a Turkish delight factory. Indulge your taste buds and discover the rich flavors of Turkish honey at a natural honey shop. Next, venture into the natural jam shop, where you can savor the taste of traditional Turkish jams made from locally sourced fruits.

A ferry ride across the Izmit Gulf awaits, offering scenic views, with an optional stop in Yalova for adventurous Quad Biking experiences, if time permits.

In Bursa, delve into its rich heritage and cultural treasures, including the ancient Inkaya Plane Tree, the striking Green Mosque, and the serene Green Tomb. Ascend the majestic Uludaƒü Mountain for breathtaking vistas and, depending on the season, indulge in winter sports or simply revel in the awe-inspiring natural landscape.  

Discover the sweeter side of Turkey with visits to a Turkish delight factory, a natural honey shop, and a traditional jam shop, sampling delectable flavors crafted from locally sourced fruits. Continue your day trip with a cable car descent from Uludaƒü Mountain to the city, or opt to rent an ATV or simply unwind amidst Bursa's serene surroundings.

title: Istanbul: Europe & Asia Continents,Topkapi Palace & Harem with Live Guide
description:
Discover Europe and Asia continents. Visit Camlica Mosque,Topkapi Palace with Harem, Hagia Irene Church and enjoy the Stunning Vista of Istanbul from Camlica Hill. Tour Timings

Duration: 08 Hours
Open: The tour starts at approximately 09:00 a.m. & ends around 05:30 p.m.

Itinerary
  • Experience the Breathtaking Panorama of Istanbul from Camlica Hill.
  • Appreciate the grandeur of the Camlica Mosque, the most expansive and impressive mosque in Turkey.
  • Explore the residence of sultans at Topkapi Palace, with skip the line ticket.
  • Embark on a journey through the Harem and the private quarters of the Sultans.
  • Uncover the mysteries of Constantinople's first church, the Hagia Irene Church.

Embark on a captivating tour across the continents of Europe and Asia in Turkey, starting with a visit to Camlica Hill on the Asian side of Istanbul. From this vantage point, behold the mesmerizing panorama of the city, where modernity meets the rich history of iconic landmarks like the Bosphorus Strait.

Next, explore the magnificent Camlica Mosque Istanbul, a stunning fusion of traditional Ottoman design and contemporary architectural elements. Its grandeur and sweeping views offer a profound experience of Islamic culture and urban beauty.

At noon, we head to European continent for lunch break and for the afternoon part of our tour. You can buy gifts for yourself and your friends from the tourist store we will visit.

After the lunch break continue your adventure with a Visit to Topkapi Palace, the opulent former residence and administrative center of Ottoman Sultans for over four centuries. Don't wait in the ticket line for hours, pay your ticket fee in Turkish Lira cash to your guide. Let your guide buy your skip the line ticket for you.

Marvel at the priceless treasures on display, including sacred Islamic relics, imperial artifacts, and exquisite works of art.Venture into the secluded world of the Harem section of Topkapi Palace, a labyrinth of chambers and courtyards that reveal the intricate social and political dynamics of the Ottoman Empire.

Conclude your exploration with a visit to the historic Hagia Irene Church, an iconic symbol of Byzantine heritage and the oldest church in Constantinople. Delve into its rich history and architectural significance as you immerse yourself in the early Christian legacy of Istanbul.

With a comfortable drop-off at your hotel, your day of sightseeing comes to a seamless and fulfilling end, leaving you with cherished memories of Istanbul's cultural richness and timeless allure.

title: The Liverpool Beatles Museum
description:
A trip to Liverpool wouldn‚Äôt be complete without a visit to the Beatles Museum. Venture inside to see a collection of all things belonging to or once part of the history of the most famous band in the world. The collection belongs to the son of The Beatles Road Manager, Roag Best. Roag has built up quite a collection over the past 30 years, with many of the items coming directly from his dad, the late Neil Aspinall. In their pomp, The Beatles were surrounded by many people, but Neil was their friend and confidante. He later became the head of Apple Corps spearheading such Beatle ventures as Beatles No 1, Let It Be Naked, The Anthology and Love (Cirque du Soleil). The Beatles counted Neil as their friend, and he was trusted by them implicitly. Neil was constantly surrounded by The Beatles and the items that he collected can now be viewed by you at the Liverpool Beatles Museum. Roag comes from a very famous family. His brother, Pete Best, was The Beatles first drummer and a key part of their rise to fame. Pete‚Äôs insights into the early years are without doubt of crucial significance to the making of what The Beatles became. His mother, Mona Best, was founder of the Casbah Coffee Club, the first rock and roll club in Liverpool. She provided The Beatles with a venue to practice and perform in, which Sir Paul McCartney affectionately refers to as ‚Äúour club‚Äù. She managed many of their early business affairs and amongst many other things championed their return to Hamburg after their deportation. Explore authentic items including guitars and drums from the Hamburg days, interviews with the band, John Lennon‚Äôs itinerary from their first American tour, the mysterious cello from ‚ÄúMagical Mystery Tour‚Äù, medals from the pop art masterpiece ‚ÄúSgt Pepper‚Äù, the earliest ever footage of the Beatles playing live, genuine gold and platinum discs, personal letters and belongings, studio monitors from the iconic Abbey Road Studios and so much more. A visit to the Liverpool Beatles museum will put you shoulder to shoulder with The Beatles and their journey from 1959 to 1970. It‚Äôs the number one place to visit for information and memorabilia and a day you won‚Äôt forget.

Timings:

Days of Operations: Daily

Start time: 10:00am to 6:00pm (last entry 5:00pm)

Exceptions: 24th, 25th, 26th, 31st December and 1st January

 


Highlights:

  • The biggest collection of Beatles memorabilia
  • See authentic items including, guitars and drums from the Hamburg days
  • The earliest ever footage of the Beatles playing live
  • Interviews with the band and much more  

Inclusions & Exclusions:

Inclusions:
  • Entry to the museum and the gift shop
  • Beatles expert available throughout
  • Written guides in German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, French, Russian, Chinese and Japanese and Polish
  • Filming and photographs allowed


Exclusions:
  • Food and drink
  • Personal guide


Please meet us at

The Liverpool Beatles Museum, 23 Mathew St, Liverpool L2 6RE

A trip to Liverpool wouldn’t be complete without a visit to the Liverpool Beatles Museum. Venture inside to see a collection of all things belonging to or once part of the history of the most famous band in the world. The collection belongs to the son of The Beatles Road Manager, Roag Best. Roag has built up quite a collection over the past 30 years, with many of the items coming directly from his dad, the late Neil Aspinall.  

In their pomp, The Beatles were surrounded by many people, but Neil was their friend and confidante. He later became the head of Apple Corps spearheading such Beatle ventures as Beatles No 1, Let It Be Naked, The Anthology and Love (Cirque du Soleil). The Beatles counted Neil as their friend, and he was trusted by them implicitly. Neil was constantly surrounded by The Beatles and the items that he collected can now be viewed by you at the Beatles Museum Liverpool Matthew Street.   Roag comes from a very famous family. His brother, Pete Best, was The Beatles' first drummer and a key part of their rise to fame. Pete’s insights into the early years are without doubt of crucial significance to the making of what The Beatles became.

His mother, Mona Best, was the founder of the Casbah Coffee Club, the first rock and roll club in Liverpool. She provided The Beatles with a venue to practice and perform in, which Sir Paul McCartney affectionately refers to as “our club”. She managed many of their early business affairs and amongst many other things championed their return to Hamburg after their deportation.  

Explore authentic items including guitars and drums from the Hamburg days, interviews with the band, John Lennon’s itinerary from their first American tour, the mysterious cello from “Magical Mystery Tour”, medals from the pop art masterpiece “Sgt Pepper”, the earliest ever footage of the Beatles playing live, genuine gold and platinum discs, personal letters and belongings, studio monitors from the iconic Abbey Road Studios and so much more inside Beatles Museum Liverpool.  

This magical Beatles museum tour will put you shoulder to shoulder with The Beatles and their journey from 1959 to 1970. It’s the number one place to visit for information and memorabilia and a day you won’t forget.

title: Tandem Skydive Desert Drop
description:
Freefall at a speed of 120 miles per hour with gorgeous views of the desert dunes.




What To Expect

Experience the adventure of freefalling from an airplane at a thrilling speed of 120 miles per hour as you skydive over golden sand dunes in the midst of the desert with this unforgettable skydive experience at Skydive Dubai’s Desert Drop Zone. 
With this tandem skydive tour package, you don’t need any prior experience as you will be harnessed to a professional instructor from the facility.


Highlights

• The only skydiving experience in the region
• Gorgeous views of the Dubai’s desert dunes
• Trained, professional instructors with years of experience


What’s included in the ticket

• Safety gear 
• Photographs and edited video


Timing: 
Sunday to Wednesday, 8 a.m. to 2 p.m.


Skydive Dubai Ticket Information:

• Bookings for Skydive Dubai are final and non-refundable (except in case of bad weather)
• No-shows and late cancellations are non-refundable in this offer.
• Please carry a filled and signed copy of the Tandem Waiver form
• Please carry a valid photo ID with you. 


Important things to know before your visit

• Skydive Dubai Dress Code: Athletic clothes recommended. No collared shirts, low-cut blouses, sleeveless shirts, shorts, or crop tops are allowed to avoid any issues in wearing the harness. Only closed shoes are allowed. Your footwear must be secure and tight, or it will come off during the drop.

• Skydive Dubai Age and Health Restrictions
   ‚ó¶ Age limit: All participants must be at least 18 years of age. Participants over 70 must bring a Declaration of Fitness form, which must be completed, signed, and stamped by your doctor.
   ‚ó¶ Pregnant women are not allowed to participate in skydiving
   ‚ó¶ Medical restrictions: If you suffer from or have previously suffered from any of the conditions listed below, kindly download and fill out the Declaration of Fitness form before your arrival.
      ‚óæ Epilepsy
      ‚óæ Fits
      ‚óæ Severe head injury
      ‚óæ Recurrent blackouts or giddiness
      ‚óæ Disease of the brain or nervous system
      ‚óæ High blood pressure
      ‚óæ Heart or lung disease
      ‚óæ Dislocated shoulder or other limbs
      ‚óæ Recurrent weakness
      ‚óæ Diabetes
      ‚óæ Mental illness
      ‚óæ Drug or alcohol addiction
      ‚óæ Any past or present medical conditions
   ‚ó¶ Weight limit
Women - Weight: 90.0 kg/ 198.0 lbs or less, BMI: 27.5 or less.
Men - Weight: 100.0 kg/220 lbs or less, BMI: 30.0 or less.
   ‚ó¶ Skydive Dubai has a zero-tolerance alcohol and/or drugs policy. There must be no alcohol or drugs in your system 24 hours before your skydive.
   ‚ó¶ Please avoid scuba diving at least 24 hours before your tandem skydive.
   ‚ó¶ In case of bad weather, your skydive experience can be delayed or canceled. You will receive a full refund if your experience is canceled due to bad weather.
   ‚ó¶ Female tandem instructors are not available at this location
   ‚ó¶ Arrival time - please arrive exactly according to the time mentioned on your ticket.
   ‚ó¶ Height limit: There is no minimum or maximum height limit for this experience 


Address: Skydive Dubai Desert Drop Zone, Al Ain Road, Dubai, UAE


How to get there:

By car: The Skydive Dubai Desert Drop Zone is easily accessible by car. You can park the car in the designated parking free of cost.

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to the drop zone from anywhere in Dubai. It’s a popular destination, and most taxi drivers will be familiar with the location.

Experience the adventure of freefalling from an airplane at a thrilling speed of 120 miles per hour as you skydive over golden dunes amid the desert with this unforgettable skydive experience at Skydive Dubai’s Desert Drop Zone. 

With this tandem skydive tour package, you don’t need any prior experience as you will be harnessed to a professional instructor from the facility.

title: London British Royalty walking tour including Changing Of The Guard
description:
This tour is a gentle stroll through some of the most famous streets in the world. We will tell you amazing stories about the Monarchy and you will see the Monarchy in action with the Changing of the Guard and the Horse Guards on Whitehall. Quintessentially British walking tour!

Highlits


You will see 4 Royal Palaces & the area from which the Monarchy have ruled the UK for centuries. You will learn about the good, the bad and the ugly of our Kings & Queens!

We start outside the Ritz Hotel and walk through Green Park (1 of 2 Royal Parks we see on the way)

We head to Buckingham Palace, the main Royal Residence in London. Where you will witness the Changing of the Guard Ceremony & see the Queens Bodyguard : the mounted Queens Life Guard soldiers

We then walk up the Royal Mall, past Clarence House (where Prince Charles & Camilla stay when they are in London) & catch a glimpse of St James Palace. We will stop along the way to admire the statues, buildings & monuments related to the British Royal Family. 

This is a fun filled interactive walking tour where we will share funny stories and tell you facts about the Royal Family

This is one of the best London guided tours you will come across!

15+ British Royal Family sights in a 3 hour London guided tour, all with a friendly local guide

Kids go free! 

NOTE: Changing of the Guard will take place daily in June & July, otherwise only on Mondays, Wednesdays, Fridays and Sundays. 10am tour only


What’s included

  • Fun Local Guide
  • 15+ Top sights of London
  • Small Tour Group Size (10-15 guests)

 

Please bring with you

 

  • An umbrella if its raining
  • Comfy Shoes
  • Drinks & Snacks
  • Camera (for all the photos you’ll be taking!)


Where We meet

We meet outside the Ritz Hotel (W1J 9BR). Next to two red telephone boxes. Nearest underground station is Green Park. Discover London's Changing of the Guard Tour, a gentle stroll through the most famous streets in the world. This quintessentially British walking tour starts outside the iconic Ritz Hotel and meanders through Green Park, one of two Royal Parks on our route.  

We'll head to Buckingham Palace, the main Royal Residence in London, where you'll witness the spectacular Changing of the Guard Ceremony and see the Queen's Bodyguard, the mounted Queen's Life Guard soldiers.  

As we continue up the Royal Mall, we'll pass Clarence House, the London residence of Prince Charles and Camilla, and catch a glimpse of St James Palace. Along the way, we'll stop to admire statues, buildings, and monuments related to the British Royal Family, while sharing amazing stories about the Monarchy.  

This fun-filled, interactive walking tour includes funny anecdotes and fascinating facts about the Royal Family. Explore over 15 sights related to the British Royal Family in this 3-hour guided tour of London with a friendly local guide. It's one of the best-guided tours in London!

title: Harry Potter Studio Tour departure from Kings Cross Station
description:
Warner Bros. Studio Tour London provides an amazing new opportunity to explore the magic of the Harry Potter‚Ñ¢ films ‚Äì the most successful film series of all time. This unique walking tour takes you behind-the-scenes and showcases a huge array of beautiful sets, costumes and props. It also reveals some closely guarded secrets, including facts about the special effects and animatronics that made these films so hugely popular all over the world. Tour Highlights



Platform 9 ¾ and Hogwarts Express

Step onto Platform 9 ¾ and venture inside the original Hogwarts Express steam engine! This permanent exhibit gives visitors the chance to climb aboard the train’s carriage and pose with a luggage trolley as it disappears through the platform wall. Scenes featuring the working train were shot at the Studios, including the iconic last scene in which a grown up Harry, Ron and Hermione wave their own children off to Hogwarts as they leave for school.


Gringotts Wizarding Bank

Enter the all new Gringotts Wizarding Bank on Diagon Alley and discover the magical treasures within. Step into Bellatrix Lestrange’s vault to find the Sword of Gryffindor and Helga Hufflepuff’s Cup, one of Voldemort’s many Horcruxes, before taking a unique photo surrounded by thousands of pieces of magical treasure…unless the goblins find you first!

Return to Azkaban (1st May – 4th September 2024)

Celebrate the 20th anniversary of Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban with our special feature! Discover brand new props, costumes, and sets all dedicated to the beloved third movie from the series. For the first time ever, the Divination classroom set will be on display, as seen when Harry, Ron and Hermione attend their first class with Professor Trelawney. Step into the Great Hall and look up at the magical ceiling of floating candles before seeing the interior of the iconic Knight Bus. See the original Leaky Cauldron bed which was used during filming and witness The Monster Book of Monsters go on a rampage in Harry’s room! This brand-new feature offers an enchanting experience for all Harry Potter fans, revealing filmmaking secrets and fan-favourite sets. Warner Bros. Studio Tour London provides an amazing new opportunity to explore the magic of the Harry Potter™ films – the most successful film series of all time. This unique walking tour takes you behind-the-scenes and showcases a huge array of beautiful sets, costumes and props. It also reveals some closely guarded secrets, including facts about the special effects and animatronics that made these films so hugely popular all over the world.

title: Experience Aerobatic Flight In Ras Al¬†Khaimah
description:
Our Action-Flight G-Force Experience is at the forefront of elite action thrills worldwide. Our highly experienced pilots will take you on an awe-inspiring aerobatic journey, where you'll encounter staggering rolls and climb rates at speeds of up to 400KPH, experiencing real face-pulling G-forces. Operating the world champion-winning unlimited category competition aircraft, the EXTRA 330, the same type that initiated the Red Bull Air Race championship, ensures an unparalleled experience. With panoramic views of the Ras Al Khaimah coastline, mountains, and desert, this experience promises a one-of-a-kind adventure. Often likened to 'the Ferrari of the skies', our aircraft are designed for advanced competition aerobatics of plus and minus 10G, though passenger G-forces typically range from approximately Plus 4G to Minus 2G, depending on passenger comfort levels. Timings

  • Winter (October -May): 06:00 - 17:00

Highlights:
  • Embark on an extraordinary aerobatic adventure aboard the UAE's renowned Extra 330.
  • Feel the thrill of aerobatics with Action Flight's Stunt Plane—loops, rolls, wingovers, and more await your exhilarating experience.
  • Action Flight possesses the exclusive fleet of top-tier aerobatic aircraft in the UAE, exceeding the G forces, climb rates, and speeds demanded by elite Air Race competitors.
  • Craft your unique adventure! Whether you crave a gentle aerobatic intro or a full-scale 5-star thrill, ActionFlight tailors each flight to your limits. Let your satisfaction soar.
  • Savor exclusivity! Revel in an intimate and thoroughly enjoyable flight with just one passenger alongside the skilled pilot in each aircraft.
  • Share the skies with a friend or family member as two aircraft per time slot await. Craft unforgettable memories together in the elevated realm of ActionFlight.

  • All passengers must complete liability waiver document


Important things to know before you visit:

  • Location: Your Action Flight Aerobatic flight takes off at RAK Internaonal Airport,Flights are conducted between 2000 and 6000 ft  in altitude usually along the Ras Al Khaimah coastline between Marjan Island , Cove Rotana and Al Rams depending on Air Traffic Control instructions to the pilot
  • Safety: The aircraft are purposely built for high performance aerobatic flight. Our pilots are commercial aerobatic instructor qualified pilots, Action Flight are a cerfied GCAA air operator.
  • Passenger Requirement:
        ‚û¢ Maximum weight limit: 110kg
        ‚û¢ Maximum height: 1.93m (6'4")        
        ‚û¢ Minimum age: 12 years        
        ‚û¢ Exclusion for pregnant ladies or those with recent surgery are not allowed  
        ‚û¢ Attire: Comfortable or sportswear suitable under the flight suit        
        ‚û¢ Avoid wearing Kandora or Dishdash due to cockpit and safety harness design        
        ‚û¢ Footwear: Sneakers or closed shoes only; no boots or high heels        
        ‚û¢ Strict prohibition on loose items inside the aircraft for safety reasons.
  • Wavier: All passengers must sign a waiver
  • Flight Briefing: Your aerobatic adventure starts with a full briefing by the pilot before your flight, Flight suit and headset/ helmet fitting and boarding assistance by our crew and pilots, The Pilot will communicate with the passenger throughout, tailoring the guest's experience to their comfort level
  • Security Requirement: For security clearance to enter RAK International Airport, all passengers require to Passport/ Nat/ Emirates ID and Mobile phone contact to confirm booking. No loose items permied in the aircraft (bags, phones, coins etc)
  • Aircraft Type: Action Flight operates the world-championship winning, EASA Cerfied competition aircraft, the EXTRA 330 - the inaugural Red Bull air race championship aircraft type. Often described as 'the Ferrari of the skies,' our aircraft are specifically designed for Unlimited category competition aerobatics. The Extra 330 has an EASA certified load factor of +/- 10G. Your Action Flight experience will demonstrate the amazing performance of the aircraft, with a combination of maneuvers such likes of loops & rolls, hammer heads, Avalanche, Inverted flight and vercal climbs strait up! Each aircraft takes one passenger per flight.

How to get there:

By taxi: You can opt for the utmost convenience and a stress-free journey by choosing a private car, taxi, or the ease of a ride-sharing service directly to the venue. Our Action-Flight G-Force Experience is at the forefront of elite action thrills worldwide. Our highly experienced pilots will take you on an awe-inspiring aerobatic journey, where you'll encounter staggering rolls and climb rates at speeds of up to 400KPH, experiencing real face-pulling G-forces.

Operating the world champion-winning unlimited category competition aircraft, the EXTRA 330, the same type that initiated the Red Bull Air Race championship, ensures an unparalleled experience.

With panoramic views of the Ras Al Khaimah coastline, mountains, and desert, this experience promises a one-of-a-kind adventure.

Often likened to 'the Ferrari of the skies', our aircraft are designed for advanced competition aerobatics of plus and minus 10G, though passenger G-forces typically range from approximately Plus 4G to Minus 2G, depending on passenger comfort levels.

By participating, clients accept and assume full responsibility for their safety and well-being.
·         Please carry your international travel insurance.

title: Sea Lion Experiences at Atlantis The Palm
description:
Discover the enchanting world of our resident sea lions at Sea Lion Atlantis Dubai. Renowned for their love of the camera, these playful marine stars steal the show with their captivating nature. Immerse yourself in the Sea Lion Encounter, exploring their biology and behavior in waist-deep water, or stay dry for the engaging Sea Lion Meet & Greet. Enjoy a complimentary photo and gain insights into their daily care routine with our friendly Sea Lion Point experts. Be entertained by the charismatic Sea Lion Show, where these marine performers showcase their talents. Embark on a memorable sea lion tour, and let these social superstars leave an indelible mark on your Dubai adventure.

Highlights
  • Experience close encounters with our lively South African fur seals indoors, safely.
  • Enter the Sea Lion Point lagoon for a firsthand encounter with lively sea lions.
  • Submerge into waist-deep waters to explore the fascinating biology and behavior of these incredible beings.
  • Participate in daily sessions guided by our amiable experts to gain insights into the captivating lives of sea lions.
  • Embark on a thrilling adventure to discover and comprehend the extraordinary realm of sea lions.
  • Delight in a lively and interactive meet & greet session with our resident sea lions, staying dry throughout.
  • Seize the moment with a complimentary photo, ensuring a lasting memory of the sea lion encounter.


Timing and Duration
15 minutes or 30 minutes, depending on the selected activity

Open Hours 
Daily from 08:45 to 17:30


What’s included in the ticket

Sea Lion Encounter:
  • 30 minutes in the water
  • Long wetsuits are provided and required for yoour experience
  • Towels,Lockers, Changing rooms and showers
  • 30 minutes check-in/changing/Safety orientation with a marine mammal Specialist
  • Complimentary juices and water
  • Free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark
 
Sea Lion Meet & Greet:
  • 15 minutes interaction with Sea Lion
  • Behind the scenes tour
  • One complmentary printed photo per paid ticket will be provided after the experience
  • Towels,Lockers, Changing rooms and showers
  • 15 minutes check-in/changing/Safety orientation with a marine mammal Specialist
  • Complimentary juices and water
  • Free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark


Ticket Information
  • Sea lion Experience bookings are final and are 100% non-refundable
  • Visitors are not allowed to bring food or beverages, glassware, or alcohol into the premises.
  • Please carry a valid photo ID with you
  • You must be able to understand safety instructions conducted in English
  • Only touch the Sea Lions under the instructions of the trainer
  • Sea Lion Encounter: Waist-Deep Water Experience for ages 8 years and above
  • Sea Lion Meet & Greet: Dry Experience for all ages; Children 2 years old and below can join for free

Important things to know before your visit
  • Sea Lion Experience at Atlantis Dress Code: You must wear a swimsuit under the wetsuit provided at the premises
  • Sea Lion Experience at Atlantis Age and Health Restrictions
  • Minimum age is 8 years old for participating in Sea Lion Encounter and for Sea lion Meet & Greet Experience is for all ages; Children 2 years old and below can join for free
  • Participants under 12 years old must be accompanied by a paying and participating adult.
  • Not suitable for pregnant women unless participating in Sea lion Meet & Greet.
  • If you have any severe medical conditions you should not participate.
  • For the safety of the animals do not wear jewelry or loose article, excessive sunscreen or tanning oils during the experience as it is harmful to the Sea lions.
  • Sea lion observes the right to refuse anyone who appears to be under the influence of alcohol or drugs.

How to get there

By car: Atlantis The Palm is easily accessible by car. If you are driving to the park, you can drive all the way up to Palm Jumeirah and follow the signs for Atlantis The Palm.

By public transportation: The hotel is easily accessible by public transportation. You can take the metro to the Mall of the Emirates station, then hail a taxi directly to the park.

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to Atlantis the Palm. It’s a popular destination, and most taxi drivers will be familiar with the location. title: Gyrocopter Flight
description:
Experience the exhilaration of a gyrocopter flight over Dubai's iconic landmarks with Skyhub's exclusive gyrocopter rides. Our two-seat gyrocopter offers a unique way to explore the city from 1,500 ft, piloted by our experienced and trusted team. Embark on a 20-minute adventure that includes breathtaking views of Dubai Marina's glittering coastline and the city's renowned attractions such as Ain Dubai, Palm Jumeirah, Atlantis, The Palm, The World Islands, and the magnificent Burj Al Arab. Capture every moment of your gyrocopter experience with complimentary pictures and an edited video to cherish forever. Let our knowledgeable gyrocopter guide lead you through the skies as you soak in the beauty and grandeur of Dubai's skyline. Whether you're a thrill-seeker or a photography enthusiast, our gyrocopter flights promise an unforgettable journey above one of the world's most mesmerizing cities. Don't miss the chance to fly a gyrocopter and create memories that will last a lifetime with Skyhub's gyrocopter ride in Dubai.

Highlights
  • Experience the exhilarating altitude of 1,500 ft with Skyhub's Gyrocopter, a distinctive two-seat aircraft.
  • Indulge in our exclusive package: a 20-minute flight inclusive of complimentary photos and an edited video capturing your adventure.
  • Experience a breathtaking route as you soar over Dubai's iconic landmarks, including Ain Dubai, Palm Jumeirah, Atlantis, The Palm, The World Islands, and the majestic Burj Al Arab.
  • Rely on our expert pilots to ensure a safe and unforgettable journey through the skies.

Inclusions
  • 20-minute flight
  • Headsets to hear your captain
  • Photos and an edited video of your adventure
  • Pre-flight safety briefing

Tickets Information
  • Bookings for Gyrocopter flight Dubai are final and non-refundable (except in case of bad weather)
  • No-shows and late cancellations are non-refundable
  • Please carry a valid photo ID with you
  • Age Limit: 17 years and above
  • Weight Limit: Your weight must be 105 kg or below (the weight limit during the summer is 100 kg)
  • All customers are requested to arrive 30 minutes prior to their booking/flight time
  • Slot are based on availability, in case of no availability amount will be refunded or rescheduled.

Important things to know before your visit

Gyrocopter Flight:

  • On the day of your flight, please bring a valid ID, a pair of sunglasses, a sweater, or a jacket (from November to February).
  • Your booking time is your flight time. Please check in 30 minutes before your booking time.
  • Our operation is weather-dependent.
  • The amount is non-refundable in the event of a No-Show.
  • In case of bad weather, your gyrocopter experience can be delayed or canceled. You will receive a full refund if your experience is canceled due to bad weather.
  • Please check with our Reservations Team, when both gyrocopters operate for simultaneous flights. Otherwise, one passenger will be accommodated at a time.
  • Passengers flying in open or semi-open gyrocopters are not permitted to carry phones or cameras for safety reasons during their flight.
  • Pregnant women are not allowed to participate in gyrocopter flights.

Gyrocopter Flight Dubai Age Restrictions:
  • Age limit: You must be 17 years old (according to the Gregorian calendar) on the day of your flight. Customers must meet this requirement.
  • Weight limit: Your weight must be 105 kg or below on the day of your flight. Sorry, this is a legal requirement from our manufacturers, and we cannot make any exceptions. Customers must meet this requirement. Due to weather conditions, the weight limit during the summer is 100 kg. 
  • Height limit: There is no minimum or maximum height limit for this experience.

How to get there

By car: Gyrocopter Flight is located at The Skydive Dubai Palm Drop Zone is easily accessible by car. You can park the car in the designated parking free of cost.

By public transportation: Gyrocopter Flight is located at The Skydive Dubai Palm DropZone is accessible by public transport. If you are taking the metro, you can get off at the DMCC metro station and take a short taxi ride to the location.

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to the drop zone from anywhere in Dubai. It’s a popular destination, and most taxi drivers will be familiar with the location.
