title: Hop on Hop off Edinburgh Bus Tours
description:
stories of the people and events that shape the city. From the cramped living conditions of the Old Town to the spacious Holyrood Park this tour gives you an excellent introduction to the City. Your ticket allows you to hop on and off the buses and really explore all the sights that you have heard about . We also offer Horrible Histories Children‚Äôs Channel ‚Äì history with all the gory bits left in! Discover Edinburgh’s rich history and iconic landmarks with a hop-on hop-off bus tour. Choose between a 24 or 48-hour pass and explore the city at your own pace.

Highlights include Edinburgh Castle, the Palace of Holyroodhouse, and the Royal Botanic Garden. Enjoy informative commentary available in multiple languages and a special Horrible Histories children’s channel.

title: Harry Potter Studio Tour departure from Victoria/Baker Street
description:
Warner Bros. Studio Tour London provides an amazing new opportunity to explore the magic of the Harry Potter‚Ñ¢ films ‚Äì the most successful film series of all time. This unique walking tour takes you behind-the-scenes and showcases a huge array of beautiful sets, costumes and props. It also reveals some closely guarded secrets, including facts about the special effects and animatronics that made these films so hugely popular all over the world. Tour Highlights



Platform 9 ¾ and Hogwarts Express

Step onto Platform 9 ¾ and venture inside the original Hogwarts Express steam engine! This permanent exhibit gives visitors the chance to climb aboard the train’s carriage and pose with a luggage trolley as it disappears through the platform wall. Scenes featuring the working train were shot at the Studios, including the iconic last scene in which a grown up Harry, Ron and Hermione wave their own children off to Hogwarts as they leave for school.


Gringotts Wizarding Bank

Enter the all new Gringotts Wizarding Bank on Diagon Alley and discover the magical treasures within. Step into Bellatrix Lestrange’s vault to find the Sword of Gryffindor and Helga Hufflepuff’s Cup, one of Voldemort’s many Horcruxes, before taking a unique photo surrounded by thousands of pieces of magical treasure…unless the goblins find you first!

Return to Azkaban (1st May – 4th September 2024)

Celebrate the 20th anniversary of Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban with our special feature! Discover brand new props, costumes, and sets all dedicated to the beloved third movie from the series. For the first time ever, the Divination classroom set will be on display, as seen when Harry, Ron and Hermione attend their first class with Professor Trelawney. Step into the Great Hall and look up at the magical ceiling of floating candles before seeing the interior of the iconic Knight Bus. See the original Leaky Cauldron bed which was used during filming and witness The Monster Book of Monsters go on a rampage in Harry’s room! This brand-new feature offers an enchanting experience for all Harry Potter fans, revealing filmmaking secrets and fan-favourite sets. Warner Bros. Studio Tour London provides an amazing new opportunity to explore the magic of the Harry Potter™ films – the most successful film series of all time. This unique walking tour takes you behind-the-scenes and showcases a huge array of beautiful sets, costumes and props. It also reveals some closely guarded secrets, including facts about the special effects and animatronics that made these films so hugely popular all over the world.

title: International Fair and Museum of the Prophet's Biography and Islamic Civilization In Madina
description:
The International Fair and Museum of the Prophet's Biography and Islamic Civilization is a remarkable cultural and educational attraction located in a serene and picturesque setting, offering visitors a profound journey into the life and legacy of the Prophet Muhammad and the rich history of Islamic civilization. Nestled within beautifully landscaped gardens and architecturally stunning buildings, this attraction is a true gem for those seeking a deeper understanding of Islam's profound influence on the world.

Highlights
  • The International Fair and Museum of the Prophet's Biography and Islamic Civilization offers a comprehensive exploration of Islamic history and culture.
  • Visitors to the International Fair and Museum of the Prophet's Biography and Islamic Civilization can immerse themselves in the life and teachings of the Prophet Muhammad.
  • This attraction serves as a bridge for cultural exchange, fostering understanding and appreciation for Islamic civilization's contributions to our global heritage.
  What’s included in the ticket
  • Entry to the museum 
Important things to know before your visit

  • Food and drinks are not allowed into the venue.

By car: The International Fair and Museum of the Prophet's Biography and Islamic Civilization is easily accessible by car. Please note that there's no designated area for parking.   

By taxi: You can also take a taxi or request a ride-hailing service to the Museum from anywhere in Madina. It's a famous destination and most drivers will be familiar with the location. The International Fair and Museum of the Prophet's Biography and Islamic Civilization is a remarkable cultural and educational attraction located in a serene and picturesque setting.

It offers visitors a profound journey into the life and legacy of the Prophet Muhammad, as well as the rich history of Islamic civilization.

title: Ancient Ephesus & Wine Tasting Private Tour
description:
Explore the archaeological wonders of Ancient Ephesus and the charming, historic Sirince Village, with highlights including the Temple of Artemis, the ancient library and theatre, and a delightful wine tasting experience.
  • Walk on the ancient streets of Ephesus where Mother Mary, St. John walked
  • See the monuments such as Great Theather, Odeon Temple, Trajan Fountins, Celsus library
  • Learn history about early christians and Romans from your expert local guide
  • Walk the cobblestone historical roads of Sirince Village, 
  • Taste handmade wines, experience shopping with locals
According to the pick-up time that we will arrange according to your ship's arrival time, meet your guide at the port and set out towards the first visit point, Ancient Ephesus; An Archeological treasure, The best preserved classical city in Eastern Mediterranean. During the 1C AD Ephesus was the second largest city on the planet after Rome with more than 250.000 citizens. It was in the center of the known world and played the role of a gateway between the East and the West. With its giant horbour it was also the center of trading in antiquity. It was not only a rich commercial city but also an impressive city that even Mark Anthony and Cleopatra spent their honeymoon in Ephesus. 

It is also home to one of the seven wonders of the ancient world, Temple of Artemis. Ephesus is also well preserved that, walking on the ancient streets among the beautiful monuments such as the third largest library of the ancient world or the largest roman theatre on Asia continent, gives you the feeling of a time traveller.   
After visiting Ephesus, proceed to Sirince Village; A little charming village is located on the mountains 15km to the north of Ephesus, famous with its wine and olive oil like Ephesus in history. It was originally a Rum village which was abondened after the population exchange with Greece in 1922, most houses are restored andsome are converted into guest houses.  Visit the historic church that is the symbol of the village. In the old wine cellar, get information about the wine history of the region from local expert, enjoy wine tasting (5 different wine), and taste the snacks prepared for you (dry nuts, fruit and pizza).  

At the end of the tour, we depart for Ku≈üadasƒ± port.  On the way, You have option visit state-supported cooperatives such as carpet villages and leather production factories to develop the region and local people, experience their construction, learn their history, and if there is a product you like, you can buy it at discounted prices. If you prefer to return to your port please advise your professional guide, and you will be returned directly to your port.

Key Sights
  • Ephesus Ancient City
  • ≈ûirince Village

The Ancient Ruins of Ephesus is so well preserved that, walking on the ancient streets among the beautiful monuments such as the third largest library of the ancient world or the largest roman theatre on Asia continent, gives you the feeling of a time traveller.

After the Ancient Ephesus tour, proceed to Sirince Village; a little charming village is located on the mountains 15km to the north of Ephesus, famous with its wine and olive oil like Ephesus in history. title: Palace of Holyroodhouse Entry Tickets
description:
Situated at the end of the Royal Mile in the centre of Edinburgh, against the breathtaking backdrop of Arthur‚Äôs Seat, the Palace of Holyroodhouse is absolutely stunning both inside and out. The official Royal residence in Scotland, Her Majesty the Queen conducts important official business here, as well as hosting lavish engagements and garden parties. Nestled at the end of the Royal Mile in Edinburgh, the Palace of Holyroodhouse offers a stunning view of Arthur’s Seat. This historic palace, the official Royal residence in Scotland, has hosted many significant events, including official business, lavish engagements, and garden parties by Queen Elizabeth  

State Apartments  

Wander through the beautifully decorated State Apartments, famous for their intricate plasterwork ceilings, historic artworks, and stunning tapestries. The decor reflects the changing tastes of different monarchs over the centuries. Be sure to visit the Throne Room, where the Order of the Thistle's Knights and Ladies dine, and the Great Gallery, the palace's largest room, adorned with portraits of Scotland’s legendary kings by Jacob de Wet.

Mary, Queen of Scots’ Chambers  

Step into the historic chambers of Mary, Queen of Scots, where many dramatic events, including the murder of her Italian secretary, took place. During her brief and tumultuous reign, Mary lived at the Palace of Holyroodhouse. Explore her Bedchamber, the Outer Chamber, and her oratory to get a glimpse into her life and times.
Discover the rich history and splendor of the Palace of Holyroodhouse in Edinburgh, Scotland, and the historic Holyrood Abbey during your visit.

title: The London Dungeon Entry Ticket
description:
Teleport back to the past and learn about the dark past of London at the London Dungeon. Bringing 1000 years of unsavoury London history to life, become immersed into the attraction packed full of lively real-life actors, vibrant sets and special effects! Learn about the infamous Gunpowder Plot and meet Jack the Ripper. Highlights:



Think you have what it takes to face the horror of The London Dungeon? No? Well maybe the promise of a stiff drink will help fire up your courage. Guests can book a Screams and Spirits ticket to get entry to the attraction AND a Premium Cocktail of their choice in our Tavern, located at the end of the tour. Themed cocktails include the spell-binding Hex on the Beach or dangerously delicious Ripper’s Revenge. Mocktails are also available for anyone with “responsibilities” (boring) or if you’re under-18 (illegal). Step into the chilling world of London Dungeon with an entry ticket that transports you to 1000 years of the city's dark and dramatic history. Encounter live actors, immersive sets, and thrilling rides as you journey through notorious tales like the Gunpowder Plot and encounters with Jack the Ripper on the London Dungeon Jack the Ripper tour. Experience the spine-tingling London Dungeon rides, including a terrifying trip to Newgate Prison Ride to Doom. Enhance your visit with a tavern cocktail, mingling with characters from London’s 'bad old days' at the Dungeon Tavern for a truly unforgettable London Dungeon experience.

title: Whirling Dervishes Show
description:
Watch the mystical ritual of the Mevlevi Order, whose whirling dance has been declared a UNESCO Heritage of Humanity.

Watch the mystical ritual of the Mevlevi Order, whose whirling dance has been declared a UNESCO Heritage of Humanity. The Sema ceremony is a journey through man’s spiritual ascent to “perfection” through mind and love—a truly unmissable and astonishing experience of music and moves.

Exhibition features Information displays about dervishes and their ceremony , objects belonging to the world of dervishes such as clothing , musical instruments and personal tools , books. Also Interactive Rumi poems and sufi music samples, Hyperrealist style dervish statues and Video shows are part of this unique exhibition.

Discover the mesmerizing Mevlevi Sema ceremony, a UNESCO treasure in Istanbul. This exhibition features dervish artifacts, interactive Rumi poems, and sufi music that take you on a journey through tradition and spirituality. Experience the magic of the whirling dervishes shows that are part of this unique tour in Istanbul. Engage with interactive Rumi poems, sufi music samples, and hyperrealist-style dervish statues. Don't miss the captivating video shows that are part of this unique exhibition.

title: Shrek‚Äôs Adventure London Entry Ticket
description:
An enchanting adventure for the whole family; experience London‚Äôs latest attraction - the brand new Shrek adventure from Dreamworks Films. Take a wild and fun trip to the land of Far Far Away, encounter challenges, obstacles and loads of characters from the globally successful movies series, including Princess Fiona, Donkey and, of course, Shrek himself. Highlights:



Begin by boarding a marvellous ‘Dreamworks Tours’ red London bus driven by none other than Donkey himself! A lively 4D journey packed with pandemonium, calamity and bags of fun, travel to the mystical realm of Far Far Away.   A real-life fairytale, work your way through 10 themed shows as you visit key locations from the Shrek movies, including the Poison Apple pub and the Muffin Man’s House.   Along the way, meet characters such as Princess Fiona, The Three Blind Mice, The Gingerbread Man, Puss in Boots, Sleeping Beauty and Pinocchio. Complete tasks and locate vital elements to find Shrek and the magic portal to return to London, with angry Rumpelstiltskin trying to foil your plans as you go.   Totally unique, exciting and the first of its kind in the world, this a brand new Shrek story told in a magnificent and exciting way. Packed full of 4D animation, live actors and incredible special effects, this experience is loads of fun for all the family and will have kids absolutely enthralled from start to finish. Bring the whole family to Shrek Adventure London, a fantastic new attraction from DreamWorks Films. Dive into the Shrek London Adventure and explore the land of Far Far Away, where you'll meet Princess Fiona, Donkey, and Shrek himself. This fun-filled Shrek World London offers exciting challenges and interactive exhibits, giving you the ultimate Shrek Experience London. Enjoy the Shrek Attraction London with thrilling rides and fun activities, making it a perfect day out for fans of all ages at the Shrek Theme Park London.

title: The Ghost Bus Tours - Edinburgh
description:
The Edinburgh Ghost Bus Tour is a theatrical sightseeing tour, taking you on a journey around the darker side of Edinburgh. Your creepy conductor shows you the sights onboard a classic 1960s Routemaster bus as you experience the travelling ghost tour of Edinburgh. Learn about witches, grave robbers, plague and of course the ghosts that reside in the most haunted city in Europe. A comedy horror show as you travel around the city, this is the perfect way to see Edinburgh and discover it's dark and unusual secrets.

This sightseeing bus tour is a journey around Edinburgh's gruesome past, while seeing the city's most famous sites, including Edinburgh Castle, The New Town, Grassmarket, Greyfriar's Kirk, The Old Town, Holyrood Palace and the Royal Mile. The Conductor will show you where the murders, tortures and executions took place - and where certain restless spirits still linger. Hear about Edinburgh's grisly history, from Burke and Hare to the hundreds of women drowned or burned as witches. There are also surprises onboard the bus - it was indeed once a funeral bus, so it's not a surprise that the dead may have left an imprint on the vehicle .

Enjoy this spooky ride aboard the only surviving Necropolis Bus. The Necropolis Bus Company began in the 19th century as a private funeral bus service carrying the deceased, pallbearers and mourners to the final resting place. Painted in the traditional midnight black of all the Necropolis Routemaster buses, decorative features include lamps and window curtains. In 1967, the entire fleet was destroyed in a mysterious fire... only one bus survived. Will you?	Step aboard the Edinburgh Ghost Bus Tour, a spine-chilling journey through the city's dark past aboard a vintage 1960s Routemaster bus. Led by a creepy conductor, this theatrical sightseeing experience unveils Edinburgh's eerie secrets, from witches and grave robbers to haunted locations. Discover landmarks like Edinburgh Castle, The Royal Mile, and Greyfriar's Kirk, while hearing tales of murders and executions. Learn about the Necropolis Bus Company's grim history, known for transporting the deceased, and encounter surprises onboard the last surviving Necropolis bus. Perfect for thrill-seekers, the Ghost Bus Tours Edinburgh offers a unique blend of comedy, horror, and historical intrigue.

title: Hike with a local coffee farmer
description:
Hike up the memory lane with Bu Kinaz through scenic pathways of his mountainous village in Jabal Shada Bu Kinaz grew up crossing waterfalls and climbing trees in Jabal Shada.   We’re joining him at his coffee farm and reliving his childhood memories. The trail passes through forests that open up to reveal his young days amidst beautiful scenery and stories at every turn. This is a destination where memories are made and adventures await. Join us on a coffee farm tour with Bu Kinaz, reliving his childhood memories. As we walk with the coffee farmer, the trail meanders through forests that unveil scenes from his youth, complete with beautiful scenery and nostalgic stories.  

Experience the charm of a mystery village as Bu Kinaz recounts tales of resting on familiar rocks and picking fruit from his neighbor's trees. We'll also visit his now-abandoned school, a historical structure that stands as a testament to the village’s rich cultural heritage.  

After our coffee plantation tour, we'll pause at a scenic viewpoint to exchange Qahwah, play old-fashioned games, and enjoy treats from yesteryears. Reflect on childhood memories and share laughs as we connect with the past together.

title: Beginner Rock Climbing experience
description:
Man V/s Man‚Äôah: Rocking Saudi Summer An expertly guided rock climbing adventure in the greenery of Mount Man‚Äôah Tour Description

This Summer in Saudia, challenge your crew on the ultimate adventure. Join us here in the secret destination of Mount Man’ah for the thrill of guided rock climbing.

Let your heart race against the wind as you conquer the rocky twists and turns. As you go higher you will find relaxation in the breathtaking views that open up.

On our way down we come across a beautiful hidden green valley. Don’t worry we pause for snacks and snaps at stunning viewpoints. Catch your breath and enjoy the adrenaline rush!  But it's not just about the views – the rocks you'll encounter along the way are like nature's own gems sparkling in the sunlight. 

Our experienced guides are here to ensure your safety and enjoyment.  As we pass through this beautiful hiking trail in Saudi Arabia, the experts will share stories of the land with us.

title: Guided Gaithan Hike
description:
KSA Summer Secrets: Soudah Season Getaway A laid-back adventure hike through the cool Soudah peaks to uncover a unique culture Tour Description

Soudah is a mountainous area in Asir in southwestern Saudia. Join us here to escape the summer heat by hiding in the jungle of juniper trees.

Make the most of this hidden gem in Saudi Arabia that is blessed by moderate weather throughout the year with temperatures rarely exceeding 25 °C (77 °F) in the summer.

Explore a distinct culture in the Soudah highlands, where you’ll meet the most friendly people wearing colorful traditional clothes including headbands and flower head wreaths.

Breathe out and relax in the natural beauty of this place where numerous farms are found. Uncover fascinating snippets of local history along the way.

  • Refreshments

Soudah, a mountainous area in Asir, southwestern Saudi Arabia, offers the perfect escape from the summer heat. Discover this hidden gem with its lush juniper forests and pleasant weather, where temperatures rarely exceed 25°C (77°F) even in summer.  

Join us for the Gaithan hike and experience the natural beauty of Soudah. Explore the Soudah highlands, meet friendly locals dressed in colorful traditional attire, including headbands and flower head wreaths, and immerse yourself in the rich culture of the region.  

Relax amidst numerous farms and uncover fascinating snippets of local history on your Abha hiking adventure. Enjoy a refreshing retreat and connect with the serene landscape and its vibrant heritage.

title: Hike to Mount Soudah
description:

We’re excited to explore the trails of Gurun this summer. This is the oldest route in Soudah, a mountainous area in Southwestern Saudi Arabia.

This hidden gem in Saudi Arabia is blessed by moderate weather throughout the year with temperatures rarely exceeding 25 °C (77 °F) in the summer. 

We begin our journey at Mosque Gurun, remembering the ones who walked before us. Pay attention! You could hear the stories of the past as you cross an abandoned resting place before entering the forests.

Immerse into this distinct culture in the Soudah highlands, where you’ll meet the most friendly people wearing colourful traditional clothes including headbands and flower head wreaths.

title: Sarawat Fun Hike
description:
Saudi Summer Stories in Mt. Sarawat A casual hike through the highest mountain of Abha to satisfy your curiosities Tour Description

Join us in Abha for an unforgettable summer vacation in Saudi.

We’re going on an exploration of Mount Sarawat!

The Sarawat Mountains are a part of the Hijaz Mountains in the west Arabian Peninsula, parallel to the Red Sea. 

We’ll pass through rough forest paths with the sound of fallen leaves & the smell of wet soil. At every other turn, the road will open into scenic views that can cool our hearts in the heat.

Stay alert to spot the elusive Arabian leopard, but relax through your walk as you make friends with insects birds, and trees of Aseer. 

Pass through the beautiful farms of Abha where you could try your hands and get some fresh fruits. Uncover fascinating snippets of local history along the way. Whether you're a seasoned trekker or just out for a casual walk, our trails cater to all adventure levels.

Relax on the fields with Arabic tea as you reflect on this journey with new friends and memories.

title: Westminster Abbey: Entry Ticket
description:
An absolutely essential part of any visit to London, Westminster Abbey is one of the city‚Äôs most iconic buildings. Steeped in over a thousand years of history, Benedictine monks first started worshipping at this site in the middle of the tenth century and the current building has been there for over 700 years. Glorious Architecture This magnificent gothic construct is a sight to behold and the incredible stained glass is some of the most impressive in the UK. Poets‚Äô Corner Visit the literary corner, a place of pilgrimage for literature lovers. It is named the Poet‚Äôs Corner due to the number of poets and writers that have been buried there such as William Shakespeare, Charles Dickens, and Rudyard Kipling. Kings and Queens Westminster Abbey has been the venue for 39 Royal coronations since 1066 including the current reigning King Charles III. With seventeen monarchs buried at the Abbey, it was also the wedding venue of William and Kate in 2011.

title: Sand Art Museum - Sandland
description:
SANDLAND (Antalya Sand Sculpture Museum) is one of the largest and most prestigious sand sculpture events in the world, where huge sand sculptures made by international sculptors every year on Lara Beach and created using hundreds of tons of river sand are exhibited. The exhibition, which welcomes its visitors with the theme of ‚ÄúSPACE ADVENTURE‚Äù this year, is open to visitors for 12 months with unique sculptures and various activities. Welcome to SANDLAND, the Antalya Sand Sculpture Museum, a mesmerizing world of art and imagination! Since 2006, SANDLAND has captivated visitors as one of the globe’s most prestigious and expansive sand sculpture events. Nestled on Antalya's breathtaking Lara Beach, this enchanting exhibition covers 7,000 square meters, where international artists transform 10,000 tons of river sand into monumental masterpieces. Open year-round, SANDLAND invites you to experience the magic daily from 09:30-23:00 between June 1 and November 1, and 09:00-19:00 between November 1 and June 1.  

This year's thrilling theme, "SPACE ADVENTURE," promises an out-of-this-world experience! Embark on a journey through the stars with stunning sculptures depicting humanity's space exploration. Marvel at the artistry of historical figures like Leonardo Da Vinci, Galileo, and Yuri Gagarin, alongside futuristic space colonies and iconic spacecraft. Dive into the worlds of Star Wars, Star Trek, and Avatar, all brought to life with incredible detail. Engage with the cosmos by viewing planets through powerful telescopes and experiencing the exhilaration of zero gravity with our human gyroscope.  

SANDLAND Antalya Turkey tour offers fun and excitement for all ages! Kids can unleash their creativity at the Magic Sand Castle workshop, while adventure seekers can enjoy ATV safaris and water sports. As night falls, the sculptures glow with enchanting LED lights, creating a fairy-tale atmosphere enhanced by captivating music. Don't miss the documentary at the Museum Cafeteria, revealing the secrets behind these awe-inspiring creations. Join us at SANDLAND for unforgettable adventures where art, innovation, and imagination collide!

Inclusions 
  • Entrance ticket to the exhibition Free parking space
    Exclusions 
  • Cafeteria
  • Gifts
  • Photo Shoot
Important things to know before your visit
  • As Sandland is an open-air museum, visitors are advised to bring a hat or umbrella during the summer months.
  • There is a parking area for our visitors who will participate with their individual vehicles
  • Touching and approaching the statues is prohibited

How to get there
  • You can reach the museum from the city center by taking buses LF09, LF10, KL08, VL13A, VL13, TC93, TL94.

title: Jack the Ripper Museum
description:
Visit the world‚Äôs only museum dedicated to the infamous Jack the Ripper. Gain insight into the suspects and victims of the terrible murders as you teleport to 1888 - the year that Jack the Ripper terrorised the streets of Victorian London. Spread across six floors, become immersed into the painstakingly recreated scenes connected to the murders alongside never seen before artefacts. Some of the incredible recreations include the Whitechapel police station ‚Äì the epicentre of the investigation. Inspect a wall of clues including original newspapers from the time. If you‚Äôre brave enough, descend to the morgue where you‚Äôll find actual autopsy photographs and medical reports of the nine women that fell victim to the gruesome killer. After analysing all this evidence, you might just solve one of the most famous mysteries of all time! In the autumn of 1888, a sinister figure terrorized London’s East End. Initially known as ‘The Whitechapel Murderer,’ he soon gained worldwide notoriety as ‘Jack the Ripper,’ thanks to a mysterious letter sent to a London news agency—a copy of which you'll see on our tour.  


This museum tour will bring to life this eerie chapter of London’s history, unraveling the mysteries behind one of England's most infamous serial killers.

title: Stonehenge Entry Tickets
description:
Stonehenge, one of the wonders of the world, stands as a testament to the ingenuity and sophisticated society of ancient Britain. This prehistoric monument, erected between 3000 BC and 1600 BC, has intrigued historians and visitors alike with its grand stone circle aligned with the midsummer solstice sunrise. The exact purpose of Stonehenge remains a subject of debate, adding to its mystique. Visitors to Stonehenge can explore this enigmatic site and ponder whether it served as a place of sun worship, a healing sanctuary, a sacred burial site, or something else entirely. The monument's construction, involving the transportation and precise shaping of massive stones, showcases the remarkable organizational and engineering skills of its builders. title: Dubai: Morning Heritage Safari by Vintage G-Class & Al Marmoom Oasis
description:
More Info Embark on a captivating journey to Al Marmoom Desert Conservation Reserve, Dubai's largest unfenced desert sanctuary, covering 10% of the city's total area with Dubai Morning Heritage Safari. Your morning desert safari tour begins with a comfortable 50-minute ride from your hotel in a modern, air-conditioned vehicle. Upon arriving at this pristine desert reserve, you'll transfer to a Vintage G-Class vehicle, perfectly suited for exploring the undulating dunes. During your 30-40 minute drive, you'll have the chance to witness the desert's unique flora and fauna, pausing for photo opportunities that capture the breathtaking landscape and offer insights into the traditional Bedouin lifestyle.

As you arrive at the Traditional Bedouin Village, you're greeted with warm Emirati hospitality, enjoying gahwa and sweets. The village, constructed with natural materials such as goat hair, provides an authentic glimpse into Bedouin culture. Here, you can partake in a camel caravan ride, traverse the mesmerizing desert dunes, and observe the indigenous plants and wildlife. Watch a live demonstration of traditional Arabic coffee making, a ritual that highlights the rich cultural heritage of the region. Capture unforgettable moments with a majestic falcon, and indulge in a traditional Bedouin breakfast amidst the serene desert oasis, where a natural water supply supports lush vegetation.

After soaking in the tranquil ambiance and the picturesque surroundings of the Bedouin Village, your Dubai Morning Safari concludes with a comfortable ride back to your hotel. The Al Marmoom Oasis Experience offers not only an adventure but also a deep appreciation for the rich Bedouin culture and the natural beauty of Dubai's desert landscape.

Today the Gallery hosts a programme of changing exhibitions from the Royal Collection. title: British Museum Guided Tour
description:

title: Private group Boating Experience with Snorkeling and Coastal Experience
description:
Our fully customized boating experience offerings cover all must-see and do at sea in Muscat including the following enhancement experiences: - Coastal Tour - Snorkeling

Discover the rich maritime heritage of Muscat with our fully customized, exclusive boating experiences. Choose from our coastal tour and snorkeling adventures, each designed to showcase the best of Muscat’s stunning coastline.

The coastal tour, lasting a minimum of one hour, takes you past the dramatic rocky faces, historic fishing villages, and ancient Portuguese forts that date back to the period between 1507 and 1650. Marvel at these historical structures alongside more recent landmarks such as Al Alam Palace, Al Bahar Street, and Souq Mutrah. As the tour concludes, enjoy a breathtaking sunset view over the rocky cliffs near Al Bahar Street, creating a truly memorable snorkeling and coastal experience.

For those looking to explore the underwater world, our snorkeling experience offers a minimum of one hour in the serene and protected waters described as the “Omani Fjords.” Dive into a shallow, vibrant site rich with colorful corals and home to green and hawksbill turtles year-round in Muscat, Oman.

This adventure is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, kayaking, and stand-up paddleboarding. Remember to bring sun protection and consider using coral-friendly products to help preserve the delicate marine environment.

title: Exclusive Boating Experience - Dolphins Watching
description:
The sea around Muscat is rich in life due to its location and seasonal cold-water currents that keep our corals healthy and full of life. Dolphin's hunt and travel along the coast of Oman from Musandam to Salalah, and Muscat has a fair share of sightings of spinner dolphins, bottlenose dolphins, and common dolphins. We also see plenty of whale sharks (from May to October), false killer whales, and occasional sightings of humpback whales and orcas. On rare occasions, we can see Arabian and blue whales. We do our best to get you to experience wildlife watching in a responsible manner to help protect our resident sea creatures and ensure a quality experience for all.

Embark on an unforgettable marine wildlife tour along Muscat's vibrant coastline with dolphin watching trip Muscat, Oman, where the sea is teeming with life thanks to its unique location and seasonal cold-water currents. These currents nurture the rich coral reefs and attract a variety of marine creatures, making this region a hotspot for dolphin sightseeing. As you cruise the waters on this exclusive boat tour, you'll have the opportunity to spot spinner, bottlenose, and common dolphins, all of which frequent this area. From May to October, keep an eye out for the gentle giants—whale sharks—as well as false killer whales, with the possibility of encountering humpback whales, orcas, and even the elusive Arabian and blue whales on rare occasions.

Your boating adventures begin at Marina Bandar Al Rowdha, where you'll be greeted at the Qantab Tourism office 15 minutes before departure for registration. Afterward, you'll board the boat and set off in search of dolphins, guided by local knowledge and visual scouting. Depending on where the dolphins are found, the boat will then return to the marina, taking you on a scenic route past the picturesque fishing villages of Qantab and Al Bustan. Throughout the dolphin and whale watching tour, we prioritize responsible wildlife watching, ensuring that you enjoy a thrilling experience while helping to protect the resident sea creatures and their natural habitat.

title: Private fishing boat tour
description:
We offer an authentic and unforgettable experience for those seeking the ultimate Omani fishing adventure. Join our Omani expert fishing guides as they take you to the most pristine and untouched fishing locations along the breathtaking coast of Oman. We will tailor our fishing tours to your preferences, with personalized itineraries and a range of options that cater to you. For however long, wherever you want to go - and whatever other sea activities you want to do, we‚Äôll take care of you. Our guides are highly experienced in sports game fishing techniques, including trolling, bottom fishing, and yellowfin tuna fishing. Our guides come from a rich fishing culture and can even demonstrate the traditional hand-line fishing techniques of Oman to ensure you have a cultural experience. The waters off the coast of Oman are teeming with various fish, including giant trevally, barracuda, long-line tuna, yellow-fin tuna, dogtooth tuna, sailfish, groupers, and amberjack, almost all year round. From May to August, you can also expect to catch mahi-mahi. As responsible anglers, we promote catch-and-release practices to ensure the preservation of the fish population, so that we can continue to enjoy fishing for generations to come. However, our chef can still prepare an exquisite meal using locally sourced ingredients for you to enjoy your catch. Our fishing tours are fully equipped with all necessary fishing equipment, and depart from the jetty at Jumeirah Muscat Bay. Our purpose-built boats, including a fighting chair and onboard restrooms, are rigged for full-day fishing tours. During your tour, you'll have the opportunity to explore the stunning limestone cliffs along the coast, charming fishing villages, and historical landmarks. Our guides prioritize your safety and comfort, and all standard safety equipment, including life jackets, GPS, fish finder, and satellite phone are provided. Book your exclusive fishing tour with us today for a truly unforgettable and luxurious adventure on the pristine waters of Oman.

title: Private group tour of Daymaniyat Islands
description:
Join us on an exclusive, private, and unforgettable sea tour. Welcome aboard the Jewel of Muscat sea experience! We'll explore the hidden gems of South East Muscat and the Daymaniyat Islands.

Embark on an exclusive, private Daymaniyat Islands tour aboard the Jewel of Muscat, where you’ll discover the hidden gems of South East Muscat and the Daymaniyat Islands. Departing from Marina Bandar Al Rowdha, the adventure begins with a thrilling dolphin watching experience, where you’ll admire the breathtaking coastline and limestone cliffs.

As pods of dolphins dance around the boat, you might also have the chance to spot various species of whales in their natural habitat. This exhilarating start sets the tone for an unforgettable day at sea.

Next, embark on the Daymaniyat Islands private tour, a pristine group of nine uninhabited islands known for their turquoise waters and vibrant coral reefs. During the Daymaniyat Islands boat trip, you’ll explore Turtle Bay in your first snorkelling session, encountering diverse marine life including over two hundred species of fish, sea turtles, and even whale sharks from September to November.

After a refreshing snorkel, enjoy a picnic lunch surrounded by the untouched beauty of the islands. The Daymaniyat Islands sea tours, Muscat continues at Coral Bay, where a second snorkelling session awaits, revealing more colorful reefs and exotic fish. As we sail back to Muscat, you’ll take in the stunning views of the coastline, historical forts, and landmarks of old Muscat, all while enjoying the sunset and learning about Oman's rich history.

title: Private group Boating Experience with Snorkeling and Coastal Experience
description:
Our fully customized boating experience offerings cover all must-see and do at sea in Muscat including the following enhancement experiences: - Coastal Tour - Snorkeling

Discover the rich maritime heritage of Muscat with our fully customized, exclusive boating experiences. Choose from our coastal tour and snorkeling adventures, each designed to showcase the best of Muscat’s stunning coastline.

The coastal tour, lasting a minimum of one hour, takes you past the dramatic rocky faces, historic fishing villages, and ancient Portuguese forts that date back to the period between 1507 and 1650. Marvel at these historical structures alongside more recent landmarks such as Al Alam Palace, Al Bahar Street, and Souq Mutrah. As the tour concludes, enjoy a breathtaking sunset view over the rocky cliffs near Al Bahar Street, creating a truly memorable snorkeling and coastal experience.

For those looking to explore the underwater world, our snorkeling experience offers a minimum of one hour in the serene and protected waters described as the “Omani Fjords.” Dive into a shallow, vibrant site rich with colorful corals and home to green and hawksbill turtles year-round in Muscat, Oman.

This adventure is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, kayaking, and stand-up paddleboarding. Remember to bring sun protection and consider using coral-friendly products to help preserve the delicate marine environment.

title: Dolphins Watching
description:
The sea around Muscat is rich in life due to its location and seasonal cold-water currents that keep our corals healthy and full of life. Dolphin's hunt and travel along the coast of Oman from Musandam to Salalah, and Muscat has a fair share of sightings of spinner dolphins, bottlenose dolphins, and common dolphins. We also see plenty of whale sharks (from May to October), false killer whales, and occasional sightings of humpback whales and orcas. On rare occasions, we can see Arabian and blue whales. We do our best to get you to experience wildlife watching in a responsible manner to help protect our resident sea creatures and ensure a quality experience for all.

Set sail from Marina Bandar Al Rowdha for an unforgettable dolphin sightseeing along Muscat's vibrant coast, where seasonal cold-water currents keep the corals healthy and attract a rich array of marine life. As you cruise the waters during dolphin watching cruise, keep an eye out for spinner, bottlenose, and common dolphins, all frequent visitors to this area.

From May to October, you might also spot the gentle giant, the whale shark, along with false killer whales and, on rare occasions, humpback whales, orcas, and even the elusive Arabian and blue whales.

Our dolphin watching tour emphasizes responsible wildlife watching to protect these incredible creatures and ensure a quality experience for all. We start dolphin watching Muscat, Oman by welcoming you at the Qantab Tourism office at Marina Bandar Al Rowdha 15 minutes before departure for registration.

After that, you'll board the boat, and our team will use a combination of local insights and visual scouting to locate the dolphins. Once spotted, the boat will return to the marina, passing by the picturesque coastal villages of Qantab and Al Bustan.

description:

We do our best to get you to experience wildlife watching in a responsible manner to help protect our resident Dolphins and all other natural and human assets. Occasionally, you may also spot false killer whales and even humpback whales. Marina Bandar Al Rowdha dolphin watching prioritizes responsible wildlife watching to ensure the protection of these majestic creatures and their habitat.

The Omani coastline, often described as the “Omani Fjords,” features dramatic rocky landscapes and serene wadis. This area includes protected spots ideal for swimming, snorkeling, kayaking, and stand-up paddleboarding. Our chosen snorkeling site dedicated for dolphin watching & snorkeling tours showcases shallow waters teeming with vibrant corals and year-round green and hawksbill turtles. title: Jeep safari adventure at Nabq National Park with  camel ride and dinner
description:
Embark on a 4x4 adventure through Nabq National Park, exploring desert landscapes, canyon walks, and Bedouin culture. Enjoy camel rides, visit Bedouin cemeteries, and relax with tea and shisha in a traditional tent. A thrilling way to experience the wild side of Sharm El Sheikh in just a few hours. Embark on a 4x4 adventure through Nabq National Park, exploring desert landscapes, canyon walks, and Bedouin culture.

Enjoy camel rides, visit Bedouin cemeteries, and relax with tea and shisha in a traditional tent.

A thrilling way to experience the wild side of Sharm El Sheikh in just a few hours.

title: Historical Muscat Sunset Tour
description:
Experience tranquility on our golden hour cruise of old Muscat. This cruise sails past fishing villages, Portuguese watch towers and forts, old Muscat land marks, and concludes with a view of Mutrah Souq and the surrounding mountains, as the sun sets behind them. This tour covers the natural beauty of Muscat‚Äôs coastline, sighting the last few remaining fishing villages, historical cemetery bay, Portuguese structures, the Sultan‚Äôs palace, and Al Bahar street. With your own exclusive boat, relax and enjoy a local insight into Omani culture. This tour can‚Äôt be missed on your trip to Muscat, blending the unique flavours of our rich culture and natural beauty.

title: Ain Sokhna Full-day Snorkeling Cruise and Submarine with Private Return Transfer From Cairo
description:
Escape Cairo's noise on a private transfer to Ain Sokhna Resort. Dive into the Red Sea's crystal-clear waters on a submarine adventure. Then, relax on a half-day boat cruise, snorkel, and enjoy a sumptuous lunch buffet. Embark on this unique sea trip with family and friends!

Tour description

  • Enjoy a private return transfer from Cairo, so you won't have to travel with other passengers and escape the noise of Cairo for a day and pamper yourself at Ain Sokhna Resort with your family and friends, relax and discover the crystal-clear waters of the Red Sea.
  • Get a complimentary morning pick-up from your accommodation in Cairo and then drive towards Ain Sokhna located on the western shore of the Red Sea's Gulf of Suez, approximately 120 kilometers east of Cairo.
  • Upon arrival, you get onboard the submarine. It offers wonderful views of the water world in the submarine lighting. If you feel like relaxing a bit, the main deck is ideal for soaking up the sun's rays. Afterwards, you get on board a boat and enjoy a relaxing half-day boat cruise on the Red Sea with your family or friends. Explore snorkeling sites where you will have the opportunity to watch the colorful underwater world. Keep your eyes peeled for fish and other sea creatures in their natural habitat. Enjoy a sumptuous lunch buffet served on board with salads and dishes prepared in the traditional way.
  • Join this unique experience and enjoy a fabulous sea trip with your family or friends!

 

Inclusions
  • Private return transfer from Cairo with free pick up and drop off.
  • Semi-submarine cruise
  • Half-day boat trip
  • Lunch, drinking water and tea.
  • Transportation in air-conditioned vehicle.
  • Private escort representative
  • Life jacket
  • Insurance

Exclusions

  • Snorkeling equipment (Available to rent on the spot ($3 for the mask and $3 for the fins).
  • Swimsuit or towels.
  • Additional food or drinks

 

Meeting point

  • Please meet our Representative at your hotel lobby or agreed accommodation place.

Important information

  • Please wear comfortable clothes, and bring your hat, sunglasses, water, camera and money for shopping and tipping.
  • Please also bring your swimsuits and towels.
  • Please leave your accommodation and contact details during booking process.
  • Our Team will contact you 24 hours prior tour date to reconfirm the pickup time and locations.
  • Tour program and duration are subject to slight change for operational reasons.
  • This tour includes private return transfer, still the boat trip and seascope run in shared with other customers on board.
  • This tour is available in English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, and Arabic.

 

Cancellation policy

  • Receive a 100% refund if you cancel up to 24 hours before the experience begins.

Voucher Info

  • Digital voucher accepted, so please present your digital voucher to Travco Representative at pickup from your hotel.
Escape Cairo's noise on a private transfer to Ain Sokhna Resort.

Dive into the Red Sea's crystal-clear waters on a submarine adventure. Then, relax on a half-day boat cruise, snorkel, and enjoy a sumptuous lunch buffet.

Embark on this unique sea trip with family and friends!

title: The Museum of Illusions, Dubai
description:
Discover one of the most unique museums in the city with exciting illusions.


What To Expect

Experience captivating and mind-bending illusions that will make you curious and excited at The Museum of Illusions, Dubai. From a unique anti-gravity room to tricky puzzles and optical illusions, this museum tour is enjoyable and educational for both kids and adults. 


Highlights

• Experience the Vortex Tunnel, a unique rotating cylinder that makes it seem like the bridge is swaying and shaking.
• Visit the Anti-Gravity Rooms that allow you to resist gravity, making it appear you're standing upside down.
• Take part in exciting puzzles, optical illusions and brain teasers that will leave you entertained and educated at the same time.
• Enjoy many incredible and Instagram-worthy photo opportunities inside the museum.


What’s included in the ticket

• Entry to The Museum Of Illusions
• Access to all the open galleries
• Parking

Daily, 10 a.m. to 10 p.m.

• Museum of Illusions Age and Health Restrictions: A visit to The Museum Of Illusions is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers.

Address: Al Seef, Dubai, UAE

title: Old Cairo with the hanging church, Coptic Museum, and Sultan Hassan Mosque
description:
Old Cairo, also known as Christian Coptic Cairo, is historically significant as a location visited by the Holy Family, who found shelter in a cave above where the Church of Abu Serga (St Sergius) now stands. Explore the Church of Abu-Sergah and St. Barbara, the Hanging Church, the Coptic Museum, and the Old Jewish Ben Ezra Synagogue. Islamic Cairo, established in 641 AD by the First Muslim leader Amr ibn El-as, boasts architectural wonders like the mosque of Amr ibn El-as. visit the renowned El Sultan Hassan Mosque, founded in 1356 AD by Sultan Hassan, and the Al-Rifa‚Äôi Mosque, which dates back to around 1361 and that has the mausoleum of the Egypt Royal Family as well as last Shah of Iran, Reza Pahlavi.

Tour description

The Old Cairo, known as Christian Coptic Cairo, is among the most important locations visited by the Holy Family who took shelter in a cave above where, in later years, the Church of Abu Serga (St Sergius) was built. Also visit the Church of Abu-Sergah and St. Barbara, the hanging church, with the Coptic Museum and the old Jewish Ben Ezra Synagogue.

Continue to the Islamic Cairo that was founded in 641 AD by the First Muslim leader Amr ibn Elas and visit his mosque. Afterwards, visit El Sultan Hassan Mosque that also known as 'Madrasa El Sultan Hassan' that was founded by Sultan Hassan in 1356 AD. Lastly, visit the Al-Rifa’i Mosque, opposite the Mosque-Madrassa of Sultan Hassan, which dates from around 1361 and that has the mausoleum of the Egypt Royal Family as well as last Shah of Iran, Reza Pahlavi.

Inclusions

  • Hotel pick-up and drop-off
  • Entrance fees
  • Certified Egyptologist
  • Insurance

Exclusions

  •  Lunch or Drinks

 

 

Meeting point

  • Please meet our Representative at your hotel lobby

Important Information 

  • Please wear comfortable clothes, and bring your hat, sunglasses, water, camera and money for shopping and tipping.
  • Please leave your accommodation and contact details during booking process.
  • Our Team will contact you 24 hours prior tour date to reconfirm the pickup time and locations.
  • Tour program and duration are subject to slight change in case of Traffic jam.
  • This tour is available in English, German, French, Italian, Polish, Dutch, Russian, Spanish, and Arabic.
  • There is a minimum of 2 adults to book this shared tour.

 

Cancellation policy

  • Receive a 100% refund if you cancel up to 24 hours before the experience begins.

Explore the Church of Abu-Sergah and St. Barbara, the Hanging Church, the Coptic Museum, and the Old Jewish Ben Ezra Synagogue.

Islamic Cairo, established in 641 AD by the First Muslim leader Amr ibn El-as, boasts architectural wonders like the mosque of Amr ibn El-as.

Visit the renowned El Sultan Hassan Mosque, founded in 1356 AD by Sultan Hassan, and the Al-Rifa’i Mosque, which dates back to around 1361 and that has the mausoleum of the Egypt Royal Family as well as last Shah of Iran, Reza Pahlavi.

title: Saffron Dinner Buffet at Atlantis the Palm
description: A dining experience not to be missed! Explore the incredible buffet at Atlantis restaurant, Saffron. Enjoy the theatrical live cooking stations and go on a culinary journey to Southeast Asia, Malaysia and India.	With more than 220 dishes and 20 live cooking stations, you're spoiled for choice at Saffron, Dubai's largest buffet. Enjoy flavour-packed dishes at dinner and enjoy as Saffron shines a spotlight on cuisines from around the world with Southeast Asian, Indian and seafood buffet feasts. With different themed nights to enjoy you can plan for your special evening! Monday (India Express)- Discover the flavours of India as you dine on tantalising curries, tandoori dishes and vegetarian favourites. Tuesday (Seafood Night) - Enjoy a Seafood feast including endless lobster, crab and oysters. Wednesday - Katsu and Kimchi, hop aboard a delightful gastronomic journey to Asia and indulge in flavours from Korea to Japan. Thursday (Indonesian Night) - Immerse yourself in the exotic flavours of Indonesian cuisine with your favourite dishes like nasi goreng and satay skewers. Friday (Thai Night) - Taste of Thai, explore the different flavours of Thailand and indulge in a variety of street food and authentic classic dishes. Saturday (Great Wall of China) - Delight in an array of authentic dishes, each crafted to bring you the true essence of China's rich culinary heritage. Sunday (Singapore's Origen) - Experience the diverse culture of Singapore and its bold flavours, a fusion of Malay, Chinese and Indian Culinary. *Please note that theme nights can change at the restaurant's discretion, please check the venue's website for the current updates.	Indulge in delicacies from around the world at this award-winning buffet at Saffron. Enjoy over 200 dishes and watch the chefs prepare the food through live cooking stations as you enjoy the meal with friends and family.

title: 3D Blacklight Minigolf Tickets
description: Experience a one-of-a-kind indoor mini-golf adventure in a unique blacklight setting, where you'll find yourself surrounded by stunning 3D images created by the world‚Äôs best 3D artists.	Located at JBR, 3D Blacklight Minigolf has taken the traditional mini-golf game to a whole new level with its innovative 3D designs. Gather your friends and family for a unique and different way to play the well-known mini-golf game. Conquer an 18-hole course while being surrounded by galactic 3D images that transport you through three immersive worlds. From floor to ceiling, the entire indoor golf course has been decorated with vibrant graphics hand-painted by the world’s best 3D artists. Before the game starts, put on the 3D glasses provided by the venue and begin your immersive experience. Start with putting the ball at the optional starting position and putt your way around the many obstacles while keeping the ball from bouncing off the track. After you have completed the 18 rounds, the ultimate victory goes to the player with the least number of points. No matter if you are a skilled pro or a novice, this family-friendly activity ensures a fun outing filled with opportunities to capture Instagram-worthy shots.	Experience a one-of-a-kind indoor mini-golf adventure in a unique blacklight setting, where you'll find yourself surrounded by stunning 3D images created by the world’s best 3D artists.

title: Sunrise Hot Air Balloon Experience with Free Transfers
description:
40-70 minute hot air balloon ride over the desert in Dubai.


What To Expect

Experience sunrise from a hot air balloon 3,000 feet above the ground over the desert with spectacular views in this unique hot air balloon experience in Dubai hosted by Balloon Adventures.


Highlights

• Pickup time is between 04:00 A.M to 05.00 A.M, depending on the location.
• Flight time approx. 40 to 70 minutes between 05.30 A.M. to 08.00 A.M., depending on weather conditions.
• The balloon will float through the air for 40 to 70 minutes, depending on weather conditions.
• Drop off time approx. in between 08.00 AM to 9.00 AM back to the hotel, depending on hotel location and traffic.
• Instructions will be given by the pilot and the operation team.


What’s included in the ticket

• Pick-up and drop-off
• 40–70 minute hot air balloon ride
• Refreshments
• E- Flight Certificate
• Gourmet Breakfast in the camp ( if option selected )
• Falconry ( if option selected )
• Camel ride ( if option selected )

Sunrise Hot Air Balloon Flight Timing
  • 04:00 a.m. to 9 a.m.


Sunrise Hot Air Balloon Flight Ticket Information
  • Hot Air Balloon tickets can be canceled without fee up to 48 hours before the flight time with 100% cost refund.
  • Visitors are not allowed to bring food or beverages, glassware, or alcohol into the premises.
  • Please carry a valid photo ID with you.
  • Passengers will be asked to sign a mandatory declaration that they have no health issues mentioned above.
  • In case the tour is missed without cancellation, no refund will be provided.
  • Pre-booking a ticket online for the Sunrise Hot Air Balloon Experience in Dubai is mandatory.


Important things to know before your visit

• Sunrise Hot Air Balloon Flight Dress code: Casual, appropriate clothing is allowed during the flight. No beachwear allowed.

• Age and Health Restrictions
  • This Hot Air Balloon experience is suitable for people between the ages of 5 to 80 years old. Children up to the age of 12 years old must be accompanied by an adult.
  • The maximum weight limit for 1 adult is 120 KG. There will be double charge if your weight exceeds 120 KG    ‚ó¶ The following passengers are not allowed:
      ‚óæ Women with three months of pregnancy
      ‚óæ People younger than 5 years and older than 85 years
      ‚óæ Serious medical diseases, including heart issues
      ‚óæ People who had surgery within the last half a year
      ‚óæ People with broken parts of the body
      ‚óæ People with chronic back or neck pain or injuries
      ‚óæ People with Acrophobia (fear of height)
      ‚óæ People with physical, mental, and emotional disabilities
      ‚óæ Passengers under the influence of alcohol and drugs
      ‚óæ Passengers who have been engaged in scuba diving activities the night before

• Accessibility

The following people of determination can fly:
  •  Autism Spectrum disorders.
  •  Chronic Medical conditions
  •  Hearing impairment
  •  Intellectual disability
  •  Learning disability
  •  Vision impairment


Address: Dubai, UAE

As the Hot Air Balloon ride is located in a distant location, the tour operators will provide pick-up and drop-off. title: Dive & Snorkel Trips in Fujairah
description:
Discover the beautiful underwater world of Fujairah with three exciting experiences.




What To Expect

Full-day snorkeling experience in Fujairah with BBQ lunch
Discover the marine life of Fujairah with this exciting, fun, and family-friendly snorkeling experience. Set sail on a luxury dive boat that is equipped with various amenities and refreshments to keep you hydrated throughout the journey. This experience also includes a delicious BBQ lunch that will be awaiting you once you reach the coast after your diving experience.

Padi Scuba Diver Course 12M
The PADI Scuba Diver course is a subset of the PADI Open Water Diver course. If you're short on time but really want to become a diver, the PADI Scuba Diver rating might be right for you Ã∂ particularly if you expect to go scuba diving primarily with a dive guide. This course is an intermediate step for earning an Open Water Diver certification, if that's your ultimate goal.

Padi Open Water Diver Course 12M
PADI Open Water Diver is the first scuba certification level. A highly-trained PADI Instructor will teach you how to scuba dive in a relaxed, supportive learning environment.

By the end of the course, you'll have the skills and knowledge to dive at home or abroad and be an ambassador for the underwater world. On average the Open Water Diver course takes three days to complete. Once you have successfully passed your course you are able to explore the underwater world through fun dives or continue your diver education through adventure dives and other specialty courses depending on your interests. 

Once attained, your PADI Open Water qualification will be valid for the rest of your life and all over the world

Try Scuba Diving in Fujairah - Al Dana Lagoon
Discover Scuba Diving and find out. No experience needed – perfect for non-certified divers. Instructors guide you through basics and equipment. Then dive in Al Dana Island reefs with guidance. Fun for all – families, friends, solo travelers. Instructor-taken photos capture your special moments.



Highlights

Snorkeling Experience:

• Experience snorkeling with the help of trained instructors
• Encounter various marine species including turtlers, rays, and sharks
• Sail on a luxury dive boat with various amenities
• Tour with a professional guide who knows every site to help you spot the marine life.
• View the famous Khorfakkan Waterfall and Amphitheatre
• Enjoy a delicious BBQ meal after your diving experience

Diver Course:

• Be a confident and skilled diver
• Assemble and use scuba gear
• Manage your buoyancy
• Respectfully approach marine life
• Handle common problems


What’s included in the ticket

Snorkeling Experience:

• Pick-up and drop-off from Dubai hotels
• Basic training with professional instructors
• Full snorkeling equipment (Snorkeling experience)
• Two Snorkeling Sites (Snorkeling experience)
• Life Jacket for floating support
• Dive boat ride with a sunbed, toilets, indoor seating and refreshments
• BBQ lunch
• Females | Males Lockers and changing rooms
• Outdoor dining area
• Sunbed available at the center garden

Inclusion:

• 3 Confined sessions
• 2 Open water dives 12M Maximum
• Bottled water
• Use of SCUBA equipment

Exclusion:

• PADI e-learning fees AED 400 extra
• Towel
• Swimming Shorts


PADI Open Water Diver:

Inclusion:

• 5 Confined sessions
• 4 Open water dives 12M Maximum
• Bottled water
• Use of SCUBA equipment

Exclusion:

• PADI e-learning fees AED 400 extra
• Towel
• Swimming Shorts

Try Scuba Diving in Fujairah 

Inclusions:

  • Water, Juice

• No-shows and late cancellations are non-refundable.
• Please carry your original passport with you.

• We offer this tour in English, Arabic, Italian, Russian and Indonesian.

• Snorkeling Trip Fujairah Age and Health Restrictions
   ‚ó¶ Age limit: All participants must be at least 6 years of age.
   ‚ó¶ Pregnant women are not allowed to participate in the snorkeling experience.

title: Deep Dive Dubai Scuba Diving Experience
description:
Deep Dive Dubai is verified by the Guinness World Record as the world's deepest scuba diving pool. It offers a variety of experiences that suits different types of participants. The experience suits you whether you're an inexperienced beginner looking to explore underwater diving in Dubai, an individual seeking new entertainment activities, or a diver seeking certification. For those seeking thrilling scuba diving tours, then you might want to check out this scuba diving pool in Dubai. They have a team of highly experienced instructors to guide and instruct you as you embark on your scuba diving tour through the one-of-a-kind underwater world.


Highlights
  • Start your tour with a short instruction about how to use equipment and have a safe experience. 
  • Then you will get some practice in shallow water. After that, you will set off for the best scuba diving in Dubai where you will see an incredible underwater city.


What’s included in the ticket

  • There will be professional guidance given by instructors for Guided Scuba Diving participants.

  • Divers must have certifications
Important things to know - Discover Scuba Diving 
  • No previous scuba diving experience is required. Participants must only be able to swim

How to get there:

By car: Deep Dive Dubai is located in Nad Al Sheba, which is easily accessible by car. From Dubai-Al Ain Road, take the exit towards Nad Al Sheba and continue straight until you reach the Dubai Investment Park. Deep Dive Dubai is located in the same area and is easy to spot.  

By public transportation: Deep Dive Dubai is easily accessible by public transportation. From the Mall of the Emirates Bus Station, take bus number F55 towards the Dubai Investment Park. This bus will take you directly to Deep Dive Dubai.  

By Taxi: You can also take a taxi to Deep Dive Dubai from anywhere in the city. It’s a popular destination, and most taxi drivers will be familiar with the location. description: Explore the inside of Burj Al Arab with a 90-minute guided tour and enjoy a special Gold Cappuccino. title: Museum of The Future ‚Äì Pioneer Pass
description:
Immerse in an empowering version of the future through distinctive themes, eliciting a world of imagination you could only experience 50 years from now. For the guest that would like more flexibility, the Pioneer Pass is the right ticket for you. Select your preferred date and simply arrive anytime during operational hours (9:30am-7:00pm). Easy entry with complimentary valet parking and priority entry. The Museum of the Future is the first attraction of its kind. Built to transform the very perception of the future as we know it, the unique structure accommodates several immersive future environments that aim to position visitors in an empowering version of the future. Home to unparalleled themes designed and crafted by the world's leading product, exhibition and experience designers, MOTF explores the future of space travel and living, climate change and ecology, health, wellness, and spirituality amongst many others. Rising 77-metres above the ground with an instantly iconic exterior, Museum of the Future is located in the heart of Dubai. A prime location easily accessible to all.

The Museum of the Future Dubai is one of Dubai’s unique museums, not focusing on the past but rather on what the future has to offer. Experience state-of-the-art dynamic and interactive exhibitions that will blow your mind. 


Some of the unique exhibitions there include "Tomorrow Today," which showcases ever-changing innovations that will change the world and how researchers and designers respond to today's most pressing issues. As well as the “Journey Into the Future” exhibition, which promises to take you to the year 2071 with its re-imagination of the future. On your way out, make sure to also buy some unique memorabilia.  


So what are you waiting for? Get a glimpse of the future and get your tickets now! Keep reading for more information regarding the price of the Pioneer Pass for the Museum of the Future and the Dubai Museum of the Future entry fee.

title: Yas Marina Circuit Alfa Romeo Giulia Quadrifoglio driving experience
description:
Alfa Romeo Guilia Quadrifoglio with its utterly stylish and sophisticated exterior hides a fierce beast of an engine ready to give you the drive of your life. Put your foot down to the metal and hear the roar of the 510 BHP Twin Turbo along the epic twists and turns of the Abu Dhabi Formula 1 track. This engine produces a maximum power of 510 PS (503 bhp - 375 kW) at 6500 rpm and a maximum torque of 600 Nm (442 lb.ft) at 2500 rpm. With 0 to 100 km/h (62mph) in 4.0 seconds, a maximum top speed of 191 mph (307 km/h), a curb weight of 3516 lbs (1595 kg), the Giulia (952) 2.9 V6 Bi-turbo 510HP Quadrifoglio Auto has a turbocharged V6 cylinder engine, Petrol motor. The power is transmitted to the road by the rear wheel drive (RWD) with 8 speed Automatic gearbox Embark on an adrenaline-filled experience and explore the magic of the one-and-only Alfa Romeo Giulia Quadrifoglio, which combines style and power, packing a beast of an engine that will give you the drive of your life!   

This Alfa Romeo driving experience will allow you the chance to try out for yourself the power of the car’s motor while enjoying the thrill of driving down Abu Dhabi’s F1 track, giving you the experience of a lifetime!  

This marvellous car can reach speeds up to 307 km/h and can reach a speed of 0 to 100 km/h in 4.0 seconds. The car has a petrol motor and an 8-speed automatic gearbox.  

So what are you waiting for? Get your tickets now and experience the thrill of driving the Alfa Romeo Giulia Quadrifoglio and doing so on the F1 track in this unique driving experience in Abu Dhabi. Prices are listed on this page.

title: Yas Marina Circuit Driving Experience - Caterham Seven Express
description:
Charm meets modern technology in this super-lightweight sports car by Caterham Cars. This modern reproduction of an old Lotus design is fearsomely potent and can compete with the most powerful supercars. Drive at a blistering pace with this brilliantly fast machine at Yas Marina Circuit, home of the Abu Dhabi F1 Grand Prix.

Charm meets modern technology in this super-lightweight sports car by Caterham Cars. This modern reproduction of an old Lotus design is fearsomely potent and can compete with the most powerful supercars. Drive at a blistering pace with this brilliantly fast machine at Yas Marina Circuit, home of the Abu Dhabi F1 Grand Prix.

The distinct lines of the Caterham Seven 360 - once deemed ‘too fast to race’ – will be sure to get your pulse racing. With its extraordinary power-to weight ratio and low centre-of-gravity, this roadster will test the limits of any driver to the max. The open-air cockpit provides a total sensory experience and harks back to a bygone era of motorsport, yet its up-to-date 180-bhp Ford Duratec powerplant means pure 21st Century thrills and adrenaline-pumping performance. The track duration for this experience on average is 3 laps.

The Yas Marina Circuit Driving Experience - Caterham Seven Express is definitely an experience! Try out the Caterham Cars and marvel at the elegance and power of these classical wonders. Compete with other drivers at the Abu Dhabi F1 Grand Prix-hosting Marina Circuit!

Once deemed too fast to race, these classic supercars are still not to be trifled with. With an exceptional power-to-weight ratio as well as a low center of gravity, this car will definitely get your pulse racing. That, along with its open cockpit, will take you to the good old racing days and provide you with a unique experience. Take on the three-lap Yas Marina circuit drive and feel the unique adrenaline rush with this 21st-century wonder. Get more details about the available prices and get your tickets now!

title: Driving Experience - Yas Formula 3000
description:
Featuring a real single-seat racing car with ultimate grip, downforce from slick tyres and big wings, this is the high-speed adrenalin drive of a lifetime. Feel like a professional driver as you power around the track with the lighting quick F1‚Ñ¢ style paddle shift gear changes. The closest thing to a F1 car that most people will ever drive. Enjoy 15 minutes of fantastic, adrenalin packed driving with our expert instructor coaching you on improving your driving skills. Put yourself in the shoes of a professional racing driver revving a 3000cc V6 engine. This race worthy engine was developed specifically for the circuit by high performance Formula 1™ engineer Cosworth. Get a grasp of the inner workings of this racing car and experience truly sensational performance first-hand. You’ll be in charge of the paddle shifters, which help shift the gearbox up and down. Two on-board video cameras will capture your drive and allow you to re-live the action later on. Experience the ultimate driving thrill at Abu Dhabi’s Yas Marina Circuit with the driving experience - Yas Formula 3000! Featuring a real single-seat racing car with ultimate grip, downforce from slick tires, and big wings, the Abu Dhabi F3000 driving experience is surely the high-speed adrenaline drive of a lifetime.

Feel like a professional driver as you power around the track with lightning-quick F1™ style paddle shift gear changes—the closest thing to an F1 car most people will ever drive.   

Enjoy 15 minutes of fantastic, adrenaline-packed driving with our expert instructor coaching you on improving your driving skills. Don’t miss out on this Abu Dhabi Yas Marina Circuit Formula 3000 experience!  

Secure your spot now for an unforgettable Formula 3000 Yas Marina experience. Check our website for the latest ticket prices and availability.

title: Liverpool Tickets River Explorer Cruise
description:
Take advantage of our most popular tourism trip and experience Liverpool form water! Ferry‚Äôcross the Mersey on our 50minute River Explorer Cruise. With so much to see and do in Liverpool it can be hard to make the most of the city‚Äôs unique views and fascinating history, so if you‚Äôre in the mood to discover some of the best sights in the world. Highlights


Mersey Ferries is a ‘must do’ North West attraction and the only way to see the world famous, unrivalled Liverpool waterfront.

On board the 50 minute river cruise, visitors will discover the well-loved legacy of Liverpool and the river Mersey, with its musical and maritime history.
While taking in views of Liverpool's riverside architecture and wildlife, you can listen to entertaining audio commentary about the River Mersey's fascinating maritime history.

Hear tales of smuggling, music and war - three diverse influences that have touched this friendly city over the years and given it a unique charm.

Departing hourly, the 50 minute river experience sails from Liverpool, Pier Head, calling at Seacombe and *Woodside, Wirral.

There is simply no better way to witness and enjoy Liverpool’s iconic waterfront and heritage. (*Please note that Woodside is now closed for refurbishment)


Timings:

On the hour from 10am to 4pm


Inclusions:
  •  50 minute River Cruise
  •  Fact Sheets available in French, German, Spanish, Italian, Japanese and Mandarin.


Exclusions:
  • Refreshments.

Where We Meet:

  • Mersey Ferries Liverpool Pier Head Ferry Terminal, (Gerry Marsden) Liverpool L 3 1DP
Experience Liverpool's history and stunning views on the Mersey River Explorer Cruise. Departing from Pier Head, enjoy a 50-minute journey along the river, learning about the city's music and maritime heritage through entertaining commentary.

Admire Liverpool's architecture and wildlife from the boat while hearing stories of smuggling, music, and wartime events that have shaped the city's unique charm. Note that the cruise departs hourly, stopping at Seacombe as Woodside is currently closed for refurbishment. It's the perfect way to explore Liverpool's iconic waterfront!

title: Salsa Class
description:
The beginner salsa class is designed specifically for new entrants, focusing on the fundamental techniques of dance. Students will learn essential skills in leading and following, as well as relevant footwork and arm styling. Classes are structured to last one hour, during which I will adapt the pace of instruction to each student‚Äôs learning speed. My goal is to help them progress as quickly as possible through ample repetition and practice set to music. No partner is required to join the class; individuals can participate solo and dance with other attendees. We frequently rotate partners to enhance confidence and improve lead and follow skills across various dance partners.

The beginner salsa class in Muscat, Oman, is designed specifically for new entrants, focusing on the fundamental techniques of salsa dance. Students will learn essential skills in leading and following, as well as relevant footwork and arm styling.
